ZkE9BJn0zrQtzRMW.name: Writhing Arms
ZkE9BJn0zrQtzRMW.description:
The baatamidar makes up to four tentacle Strikes, each against a different target. Each attack counts separately for the baatamidar's multiple attack penalty, but the penalty doesn't increase until the baatamidar has made all the attacks.

If the baatamidar subsequently uses the Improved Grab action, it can Grab any number of creatures it hit with Writhing Arms.

SvCc6HA58iZaOg9T.description:
1 mile @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.v61oEQaDdcRpaZ9X]{Aura}

Creatures who start their turn in the aura must succeed at a @Check[type:will|dc:48|traits:incapcitation] save or become unable to understand any communication (including telepathy), distinguish social rank or authority, or differentiate the relative value of objects or services. This persists for as long as the creature is in the aura.

Creatures who succeed at the save are temporarily immune for 1 hour (24 hours on a critical success). Proteans are immune to the unrelativity field.

The baatamidar can suppress this aura or activate it again as a free action.
SvCc6HA58iZaOg9T.name: Unrelativity Field

K68kyyTQ4cOmTtUk.name: Mind-Numbing Grasp
K68kyyTQ4cOmTtUk.description:
The baatamidar's tentacles leech away thought. A creature that starts its turn grabbed by the baatamidar must attempt a @Check[type:will|dc:41|traits:arcane,enchantment,incapacitation,mental] save.

Critical Success Unaffected.

Success @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 1} for 1 round.

Failure @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 3} for 1 minute.

Critical Failure @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 3} for an unlimited duration.

Baatamidar.name: Baatamidar
Baatamidar.description: Baatamidars are drawn to destroy planar communities on the fringes where the Outer Planes touch the chaos of the Maelstrom. They resemble floating blobs of undulating, prismatic ooze with four quivering tentacles and dribbles of oily slime that always drip upwards.

OpV99ABQlIY3FF4G.name: Escort from the Premises
OpV99ABQlIY3FF4G.description:
Requirements The casino bouncer has Grabbed a Medium or smaller target and is wielding a nonlethal weapon in the other hand

Effect The casino bouncer makes a Strike against the grabbed target with the nonlethal weapon. If the Strike hits, it deals damage as usual and the casino bouncer moves the target 5 feet (this is forced movement) and Steps into the space the target had just occupied.

IcNV9BTE0VD3ZNXy.name: Intimidating Stare
IcNV9BTE0VD3ZNXy.description:
The casino bouncer attempts to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.action-macros.nEwqNNWX6scLt4sc]{Demoralize} a creature with a mere glance. The casino bouncer doesn't take a penalty to their Intimidation check if the target doesn't speak the same language.

If the bouncer rolls a critical success, the target can't reduce the value of its frightened condition until [[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4 rounds} have passed.

Ma9MtDSiauZ5onNI.name: Nimble Swim
Ma9MtDSiauZ5onNI.description: The barnacle ghoul Swims up to 20 feet. This movement doesn't trigger reactions.

5wVIixUHmaim2A4K.description:
Requirements The barnacle ghoul is adjacent to the corpse of a creature that died within the last hour.

Effect The barnacle ghoul devours a chunk of the corpse and regains [[/r 5d6[healing]]]{5d6 Hit Points}.

It can regain Hit Points from any given corpse only once.
5wVIixUHmaim2A4K.name: Necrofagia

LxrfittzDR3SPd3W.description:
Saving Throw @Check[type:fortitude|dc:26]

Stage 1 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 1} (1 round)

Stage 2 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 2} (1 round)

Stage 3 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 3} (1 round)

Stage 4 drowning and cannot reduce below stage 4 until the water is purged; purging the water requires a successful @Check[type:medicine|dc:26|name:Purge Water|traits:manipulate,action:administer-first-aid] check to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.MHLuKy4nQO2Z4Am1]{Administer First Aid} (which stops the creature from drowning and returns the creature to stage 3; stage 2 on a critical success) or a magical effect that removes curses or the sickened condition (which stops the creature from drowning and ends the curse).

If the creature dies from drowning, it rises as a barnacle ghoul the next midnight.
LxrfittzDR3SPd3W.name: Fill Lungs

Qv8OyAidG7v9lnwp.name: Tear Flesh
Qv8OyAidG7v9lnwp.description:
Trigger A creature grabbed by the barnacle ghoul critically fails a skill check to Escape

Effect The barnacle ghoul makes a claw Strike against the triggering creature.

AT8OH6P1ZPmkA0CR.name: Paralisi
AT8OH6P1ZPmkA0CR.description:
Any living, non-elf creature hit by a ghoul's attack must succeed at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:26] save or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{Paralyzed}.

It can attempt a new save at the end of each of its turns, and the DC cumulatively decreases by 1 on each such save.

Grunka.description:
I guerrieri che costituiscono la prima linea delle tribù goblin preferiscono combattere in gruppi numerosi, specialmente se sono almeno il triplo degli avversari.

Questi piccoli umanoidi hanno la pelle verde o grigia e una grossa testa dalle lunghe orecchie. Alcuni goblin sono civilizzati e hanno lavorato sodo per diventare membri rispettati nelle comunità umanoidi di appartenenza, ma per buona parte rimangono creature istintive e violente che godono solo nel seminare il caos. Questi goblin pensano solamente a uccidere il bestiame, a rapire neonati o ad appiccare il fuoco agli edifici solo per il gusto di farlo. Adorano giocare scherzi crudeli agli umanoidi più alti, che loro chiamano "gambelunghe".

I goblin sono creature superstiziose, terrorizzate dalla magia e affascinate dal fuoco; i goblin in grado di padroneggiare la magia o il fuoco godono di grande rispetto presso i loro simili. La mentalità dei goblin risulta alquanto incomprensibile per la maggior parte degli altri umanoidi: odiano i canidi, ma dividono le loro tane con i cosiddetti "cani goblin"; attaccano creature più grosse di loro senza battere ciglio, ma sono terrorizzati dai cavalli; inoltre odiano i vegetali ma considerano i sottaceti una prelibatezza. Per un goblin, ovviamente, queste sono tutte opinioni perfettamente coerenti.

rcbgrGgDNJ56oPrA.description:
Activate A Strike

Alchemist's fire is a combination of volatile liquids that ignite when exposed to air. Alchemist's fire deals 1d8 fire damage, [[/r 1[persistent,fire]]] damage, and 1 fire splash damage.

Grunka.name: Grunka

JzsJbViGU4nIhWiw.name: Strumenti da Alchimista
JzsJbViGU4nIhWiw.description: This mobile collection of vials and chemicals can be used for simple alchemical tasks.

Plunger Chute.name: Agenti della Vegliarupe
Plunger Chute.description: A trapdoor in the floor conceals a hidden chute, and a moving section of wall shoves victims into it.
Plunger Chute.hazardDisable: @Check[type:thievery|dc:23|name:Jam the Trapdoor Shut|traits:action:disable-a-device] (expert) to jam the trapdoor shut or activate a hidden bypass switch by twisting a fitting on the gas lamp

1d7P7fxvDCam2ALx.description:
The excorion moves about by way of hundreds of pulsating blood vessels, which stretch from its body in dozens of tight, ropy bundles and anchor it to the ground.

An excorion can't be @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.ge56Lu1xXVFYUnLP]{Tripped}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.7blmbDrQFNfdT731]{Shoved}, or otherwise forcibly moved except by magic, and the excorion ignores difficult terrain (but not greater difficult terrain).
1d7P7fxvDCam2ALx.name: Vein Walker

Kp4jOhCQVcuNVP2j.name: Vital Transfusion
Kp4jOhCQVcuNVP2j.description:
Requirements The excorion has at least 200 Hit Points

Effect The excorion sacrifices itself and transfers its bloody, vital energy to a willing living creature within 30 feet. The excorion is immediately destroyed, and the targeted living creature heals a number of HP equal to half the excorion's remaining HP at the time that it used this ability.

The living creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1} during its next turn as its body adjusts to the newly transfused blood and vital energy.

s6jGCfKSGTptJo1G.description:
The excorion paragon projects a mist of burning blood in a @Template[type:cone|distance:10].

Creatures in the area take [[/r 10d8[acid]]] damage and [[/r 5d8[bludgeoning]]] damage (@Check[type:reflex|dc:37|basic:true] save).

On a failed save, an affected creature is also @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{Blinded} for 1 round (or 2 rounds on a critical failure).

The excorion can't use Blinding Bile again for [[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4 rounds}.
s6jGCfKSGTptJo1G.name: Blinding Bile

oOj2D6OXRFRGfvRp.name: Vomit Blood
oOj2D6OXRFRGfvRp.description:
The excorion spews necrotic blood all over a foe it has @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Grabbed}.

The grabbed creature must succeed at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:39] save or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 2}.

UeMQ10mABQZgRQWs.description:
Le tue parole affascinano i tuoi bersagli. Parli o canti senza interruzioni durante il lancio e la durata. I bersagli che si accorgono del tuo discorso o della tua canzone potrebbero prestare la loro completa attenzione; ciascun bersaglio deve effettuare un tiro salvezza su Volontà. Il GM può fornire un bonus di circostanza (fino a un massimo di +4) se il bersaglio è di una religione, stirpe o credo politico opposti, oppure se è restio a condividere ciò che stai dicendo.

Qualsiasi creatura che entra nel raggio d'azione deve effettuare un tiro salvezza quando Mantieni l'Incantesimo. Se stai parlando, estasiare ha il tratto linguistico.

Successo Critico Il bersaglio non è influenzato e si accorge che hai provato ad usare la magia.

Successo Il bersaglio non deve prestare attenzione, ma non si accorge che hai provato ad usare la magia (potrebbe accorgersi che altri sono estasiati).

Fallimento Il bersaglio è @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.AdPVz7rbaVSRxHFg]{Affascinato} da te. Può effettuare un tiro salvezza su Volontà se assiste ad azioni o discorsi con i quali è in disaccordo. Se lo supera, non è più @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.AdPVz7rbaVSRxHFg]{Affascinato} ed è temporaneamente immune per 1 ora. La condizione affascinato ha termine istantaneamente se la creatura è soggetta a un atto ostile o se un'altra creatura supera una prova di Diplomazia o Intimidazione contro la CD dell'incantesimo.

Fallimento Critico Come per fallimento, ma il bersaglio non può effettuare un tiro salvezza per porre fine alla condizione affascinato se è in disaccordo con te.
UeMQ10mABQZgRQWs.name: Enthrall (At Will)

zX6RvKVyn16ug6vJ.name: Cambiare Forma
zX6RvKVyn16ug6vJ.description: The obrousian can take on the appearance of any Small or Medium humanoid. This increases their Speed to 25 feet. It doesn't change their attack and damage modifiers with their Strikes, but it might change the damage type their Strikes deal (typically to bludgeoning).

KyynowAzMYe7FJw3.name: Distorcere Mente
KyynowAzMYe7FJw3.description:
You scramble a creature's mental faculties and sensory input. The target must attempt a Will saving throw. Regardless of the result of that save, the target is then temporarily immune for 10 minutes. Warp mind's effects happen instantly, so dispel magic and other effects that counteract spells can't counteract them. However, alter reality, miracle, primal phenomenon, restoration, or wish can still counteract the effects.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success The target spends the first action on its next turn with the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.yblD8fOR1J8rDwEQ]{Confused} condition.

Failure The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.yblD8fOR1J8rDwEQ]{Confused} for 1 minute.

Critical Failure The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.yblD8fOR1J8rDwEQ]{Confused} permanently.

ciQ62q9OynsChQSL.name: Waves of Sorrow
ciQ62q9OynsChQSL.description:
@Template[type:emanation|distance:30]{30 feet} @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.v61oEQaDdcRpaZ9X]{Aura}

When a creature ends its turn in the aura, it is overwhelmed by the sorrow that suffuses the obrousian's being. The creature must succeed at a @Check[type:will|dc:33] save or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{Paralyzed} for 1 round.

DNVNuZGCllMw1hmA.name: Drowning Grasp
DNVNuZGCllMw1hmA.description: When a creature is grabbed by the obrousian, its lungs magically fill with water. A creature that can't breathe water is suffocating while it is grabbed.

wtewhF2XR7w6V0Wm.description:
A creature hit by the eberark's spit becomes coated in a slippery, flammable oil.

The creature must succeed at a @Check[type:reflex|dc:27] save or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 2} for as long as they are coated in incendiary spit.

Creatures affected by incendiary spit that take fire damage catch fire, taking [[/r 3d6[persistent,fire]]] damage. Once this persistent fire damage ends, the spit has burned away.
wtewhF2XR7w6V0Wm.name: Incendiary Spit

vvMB5rLp5hejSAmy.name: Arrogant Taunts
vvMB5rLp5hejSAmy.description:
The eberark utters crude insults and growls threateningly. Each creature within 30 feet must attempt a @Check[type:will|dc:27] save.

The creature is then temporarily immune for 10 minutes.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 1}.

Failure The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 2} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{Paralyzed} for 1 round.

Critical Failure The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 4} and paralyzed for [[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4 rounds}.

INFGwX7PUOvEy0iD.name: Trail of Flame
INFGwX7PUOvEy0iD.description:
The eberark Strides twice, leaving a trail of magical fire behind it as it moves. Squares the eberark moves through catch fire, creating a 5-foot-tall wall of flame that burns for 1 round. The wall of flame conceals creatures and objects on the other side of it.

Any creature that enters or starts its turn in the wall of flame takes [[/r 6d6[fire]]] damage (@Check[type:reflex|dc:27|basic:true] save).

7GSRG0kO6Z9IWhXQ.name: Attacco di Opportunità
7GSRG0kO6Z9IWhXQ.description:
Innesco Una creatura entro la portata del mostro usa un'azione di maneggiare o un'azione di movimento, effettua un attacco a distanza o esce da un quadretto durante un'azione di movimento che sta usando.

Effetto Il mostro tenta un Colpo in mischia contro la creatura innescante. Se l'attacco è un colpo critico e l'innesco era un'azione di maneggiare, il mostro interrompe quell'azione. Questo Colpo non conta al fine di determinare la penalità da attacchi multipli del mostro e la sua penalità da attacchi multipli non si applica a questo Colpo.

OESsshXWIJSX1LE7.description: If the shatterling attempts an Intimidation check to Demoralize a target within 30 feet of a creature with persistent bleed damage, the shatterling has +4 circumstance bonus to the Intimidation check. In addition, the shatterling takes no penalty to the check for not speaking a language the target can hear, and the target isn't temporarily immune to the shatterling's attempts to Demoralize it unless the shatterling critically fails its Intimidation check.
OESsshXWIJSX1LE7.name: Blood-Fueled Titter

7biZlvn3vY2e7oEj.name: Divert Strike
7biZlvn3vY2e7oEj.description:
Trigger A shatterling takes non-bludgeoning damage and there's an unbroken mirror at least 1 foot wide within 100 feet of the shatterling

Effect The nearest mirror to the shatterling at least 1 foot wide breaks, and the damage to the shatterling is reduced to 0.

nqTM0MryJthdq3ZY.name: Extra Reaction
nqTM0MryJthdq3ZY.description: A shatterling gains an additional reaction each turn, but can use this extra reaction only for Divert Strike.

X8bVkdHSJwnQfIoj.name: Mirror Senses
X8bVkdHSJwnQfIoj.description: A shatterling can see and hear through any unbroken mirror within 100 feet.

gczvNivaLBoVgpla.description: During this Stride, the shatterling can move into any unbroken mirror at least 1 foot wide and out of another unbroken mirror at least 1 foot wide within 100 feet of the first mirror, treating the mirrors as connected. The shatterling can move through any number of pairs of foot-wide mirrors during its mirror jump, requiring each pair to be within 100 feet of each other while doing so.
gczvNivaLBoVgpla.name: Mirror Jump

K2NRmCiVWR4uMsRg.name: Vanish in Reflections
K2NRmCiVWR4uMsRg.description: The shatterling doesn't appear in reflective surfaces if it doesn't want to. When it's within 100 feet of an unbroken mirror at least 1 foot wide, a shatterling can Hide and Sneak even without cover or without being concealed.

D27lYuRNmEYB5vjo.name: Wipe Away Cracks
D27lYuRNmEYB5vjo.description: The shatterling touches a broken mirror, instantly repairing it.

Pulping Golem.description: I golem di ferro, tradizionalmente costruiti a forma di gigantesche armature complete o di potenti animali, sono frutto di grande arte e perizia tecnica. Le loro giunture articolate e i corpi corazzati devono essere progettati e fabbricati con grande attenzione e precisione matematica. Questi costrutti vanno inoltre puliti e oliati regolarmente affinché non arrugginiscano con il passare degli anni. Sottoposti a un’adeguata manutenzione, i golem di ferro possono restare efficienti per migliaia di anni ed essere tramandati di generazione in generazione, almeno finché non vengono distrutti dall’intervento di qualche avventuriero. Oltre alla loro incredibile forza, i golem di ferro dispongono anche di un potente soffio tossico, spesso più che sufficiente a eliminare intere squadre di avversari.

HkUjt1e6CiwdfHoy.name: Soffio
HkUjt1e6CiwdfHoy.description:
The pulping golem spills its cauldron stomach to the floor, dealing [[/r 9d12[fire]]] damage to creatures within 10 feet (@Check[type:reflex|dc:33|basic:true] save).

It can't use Breath Weapon again for [[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4 rounds}.

lYvWF5v5Vah9KWsN.description:
harmed by acid (6d10+4, 2d8+4 from areas and persistent damage); healed by fire (area 2d8+4 HP); slowed by electricity

A golem is immune to spells and magical abilities other than its own, but each type of golem is affected by a few types of magic in special ways. These exceptions are listed in shortened form in the golem's stat block, with the full rules appearing here. If an entry lists multiple types (such as "cold and water"), either type of spell can affect the golem. Harmed By Any magic of this type that targets the golem causes it to take the listed amount of damage (this damage has no type) instead of the usual effect. If the golem starts its turn in an area of magic of this type or is affected by a persistent effect of the appropriate type, it takes the damage listed in the parenthetical. Healed By Any magic of this type that targets the golem makes the golem lose the slowed condition and gain HP equal to half the damage the spell would have dealt. If the golem starts its turn in an area of this type of magic, it gains the HP listed in the parenthetical. Slowed By Any magic of this type that targets the golem causes it to be slowed 1 for [[/br 2d6 #rounds]]{2d6 rounds} instead of the usual effect. If the golem starts its turn in an area of this type of magic, it's slowed 1 for that round. Vulnerable To Each golem is vulnerable to one or more specific spells, with the effects described in its stat block.
lYvWF5v5Vah9KWsN.name: Golem Antimagic

SJraLZmz7x1C04ki.description: Magical rusting effects, like a rust monster's antennae, affect the iron golem normally.
SJraLZmz7x1C04ki.name: Vulnerable to Rust

aMNM0X0dVvVRdlZT.name: Vulnerable to Neutralize Poison
aMNM0X0dVvVRdlZT.description: Casting @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.SUKaxVZW2TlM8lu0]{Neutralize Poison} on the golem deactivates its Breath Weapon for 1 minute.

ZFx4kB8JAYfSX4xr.name: Extend Legs
ZFx4kB8JAYfSX4xr.description: The pulping golem extends its legs up to a height of 40 feet, raising its body high into the air. While its legs are extended, its movement speed is halved, and it takes a -2 penalty to its Fortitude save DC against Shove and Trip attempts.

nhz5F428cTKGkc9v.name: Inexorable March
nhz5F428cTKGkc9v.description: The iron golem Strides up to its Speed, pushing back each creature whose space it moves into and damaging them if they try to stop its movement. A creature can attempt to bar the way by succeeding at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:39] save. On a critical success, the resisting creature takes no damage; otherwise, it is damaged as if hit by the golem's fist.

RSzJjCjwpz8jIS3J.name: Iron Golem Poison
RSzJjCjwpz8jIS3J.description:
Any @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained} value from this poison is reduced by 1 every hour.

Saving Throw @Check[type:fortitude|dc:35]

Maximum Duration 4 rounds

Stage 1 2d6+4 poison and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 1} (1 round)

Stage 2 4d6+4 poison and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 2} (1 round)

Stage 3 8d6+4 poison and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 3} (1 round).

Pulping Golem.name: Pulping Golem

YzsKsO21XfN1KAry.name: Dread Gaze
YzsKsO21XfN1KAry.description:
The hag gazes upon a creature, afflicting it with intense distress and a gnawing sense of impending doom, with a result depending on its Will save (DC 37). The target does not need to be able to see the sea hag.

Critical Success No effect.

Success @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 1}.

Failure @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 1} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1} for 1 round. If the target was dying, it remains unconscious for 1 day. At the end of the day, it must attempt a Fortitude save against the same DC; if it fails, it dies.

Critical Failure @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 2} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1} for 1 minute. If the target was dying, it remains unconscious for 1 day. At the end of the day, it must attempt a Fortitude save against the same DC; if it fails, it dies.

Fm6lAJIPw6ObpzHZ.name: Pull Under
Fm6lAJIPw6ObpzHZ.description:
Requirements A creature within 60 feet of Graem or Grinlowe is in contact with the waters of Stormholt

Effect The hag casts maze (DC 37) on the creature, magically pulling the creature beneath the water (regardless of its actual depth) into an extradimensional underwater maze of shipwrecks. Between the two of them, Graem and Grinlowe can have only one creature trapped in the maze, but either hag can use the Sustain a Spell action to sustain the effect.

deQl75TOphyii6YU.description: As long as at least one other member of Myrna's coven is on the demiplane of Stormholt, the coven members add chain lightning, lightning bolt, plane shift, and punishing winds to their spells, each of which can be cast at up to 8th level.
deQl75TOphyii6YU.name: Planar Coven

byUSs0eF5Ctqs4xY.description: The sea hag can make a bargain with a willing creature, who must be of sound mind. The creature gives away a special or cherished quality-such as its courage, its beauty, or its voice-in exchange for a boon or a promise from the sea hag. As long as the sea hag keeps her end of the bargain, the only way to restore the lost quality is to defeat the sea hag or make another bargain for its return.
byUSs0eF5Ctqs4xY.name: Sea Hag's Bargain

h8NOsLMsLkhSoPDm.description:
The hegessik takes the appearance of any Large or smaller creature. This doesn't change its Speed or its attack and damage bonuses with its Strikes, but might change the damage type its Strikes deal.

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.ChangeShape]

XrrgRKZ5Cs3t7Wzc.name: Entropy Sense (Imprecise) 60 feet
XrrgRKZ5Cs3t7Wzc.description:
A hegessik can anticipate the most likely location of a creature through their supernatural insight into the forces of chaotic probabilities and chance. This grants the hegessik the ability to sense creatures within the listed range.

The hegessik's entropy sense doesn't detect creatures under the effects of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.EoKBlgf6Smt8opaU]{Nondetection} or that are otherwise shielded from divinations and predictions.

CUYM17Clq1YTEBxz.name: Maddening Whispers
CUYM17Clq1YTEBxz.description:
@Template[type:emanation|distance:30]{30 feet} @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.v61oEQaDdcRpaZ9X]{Aura}

A susurrus of distracting whispers and dilations in reality surround a hegessik.

When a non-protean ends its turn in the aura, it must attempt a @Check[type:will|dc:33] save. If it fails, it becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.yblD8fOR1J8rDwEQ]{Confused} for 1 round.

NyD5wXkVBGB2Wu0I.description:
A hegessik's vital organs shift and change shape and position constantly. Immediately after the hegessik takes acid, electricity, or sonic damage, it gains the listed amount of resistance to that damage type. This lasts for 1 hour or until the next time the protean takes damage of one of the other types (in which case its resistance changes to match that type), whichever comes first.

The hegessik is immune to polymorph effects unless it is a willing target. If @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{Blinded} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.9PR9y0bi4JPKnHPR]{Deafened}, the hegessik automatically recovers at the end of its next turn as new sensory organs grow to replace the compromised ones.
NyD5wXkVBGB2Wu0I.name: Protean Anatomy 20

emBPB2m0d0BQpI2N.name: Leaching Glare
emBPB2m0d0BQpI2N.description:
The hegessik briefly opens its third eye.

Non-protean creatures in a @Template[type:cone|distance:30] must succeed at a @Check[type:will|dc:38] save or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 2} for 1 round (@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 3} on a critical failure).

oJWZY02OG1m5LrP6.name: Telekinetic Reach
oJWZY02OG1m5LrP6.description:
The hegessik manifests psychic versions of its natural attacks and makes a Strike with each of its jaws, claw, and tail, in any order. These Strikes have a reach of 60 feet.

These attacks count toward the hegessik's multiple attack penalty, but the penalty doesn't increase until after it makes all the attacks.

BeG2KYyzwrCfE6KK.name: Warpwave Strike
BeG2KYyzwrCfE6KK.description: Any creature struck and damaged by a hegessik's jaws Strike must succeed at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:36] save or be subject to a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.rollable-tables.yRZwPolTnRdnz42V]{Warpwave}

fmyoJEwSeBRrb9Ik.name: +1 Status Bonus on Saves vs. Divine Magic

Hegessik.name: Hegessik
Hegessik.npcAllSaves: +1 status to all saves vs. divine magic

Boiling Fountains.name: Agenti della Vegliarupe
Boiling Fountains.hazardDisable: @Check[type:thievery|dc:21|name:Disable Pressure Plate|traits:action:disable-a-device] (trained) to disable each pressure plate, @Check[type:thievery|dc:16|name:Jam Fountain|traits:action:disable-a-device] to jam each fountain, or @Check[type:thievery|dc:18|name:Deflect Fountain's Spray|traits:action:disable-a-device] to deflect a fountain's spray
Boiling Fountains.description: Four pressure plates beneath the floorboards activate dragon-headed fountains on either side of the room, which spray boiling water across the area between them.
Boiling Fountains.hazardReset: Once a pressure plate has been activated, it must be reset manually.

v8mqftrhdYYjlA4r.name: Mask of Terror (See Crush of Hundreds)

EEMf91Mnk5n3dYup.description: Each enemy in the penqual's space takes [[/r 4d12[slashing]]] damage (@Check[type:reflex|dc:36|basic:true] save).
EEMf91Mnk5n3dYup.name: Frantic Grasp

DNsLOiJgbt3epj8c.name: Mob Rush
DNsLOiJgbt3epj8c.description: The penqual Strides twice, ignoring difficult terrain, and then uses Frantic Grasp. If it moves at least 20 feet away from its starting position, the DC of Frantic Grasp increases by 2.

29naBTIemmuYyMKB.name: Skip Between
29naBTIemmuYyMKB.description: The sahkil can move itself between the Ethereal Plane and the Material Plane, as @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.D2nPKbIS67m9199U]{Ethereal Jaunt}, except that this ability has an unlimited duration and can be Dismissed

KkQu3TqvmvRwh5Gx.description:
A creature @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened} by the sahkil's @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.O6VQC1Bs4aSYDa6R]{Mask of Terror} feels the press of a suffocating crowd.

The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1} and takes a -10-foot penalty to all Speeds for as long as it is frightened.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-effects.R8clbf7gtIlU3fIj]{Effect: Crush of Hundreds}
KkQu3TqvmvRwh5Gx.name: Crush of Hundreds

TxhGff0LtzQslOci.description: The sahkil is considered 2 levels lower for the purposes of being summoned by rituals (such as @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.2ykmAVKrsAWcazcC]{Planar Binding}), but is always free to attack or leave instead of negotiate unless the primary caster's check is a critical success.
TxhGff0LtzQslOci.name: Easy to Call

XC6rH5AiexqlIUrJ.name: Crowded Mob
XC6rH5AiexqlIUrJ.description: The penqual is a swarm of Medium figures that can squeeze supernaturally close to other creatures. Though its component creatures are larger than those of a typical swarm, a penqual can nevertheless share the spaces of other creatures.

Penqual.name: Penqual
Penqual.npcAllSaves: +1 status to all saves vs. magic

oEHGOxor2V2wjqVL.description: A war razor is an exaggerated version of the barbers' tool. It is a brittle but extremely sharp weapon that is very easy to slip into a pocket or sleeve.
oEHGOxor2V2wjqVL.name: +2 Greater Striking War Razor

fer5YKRtixZJgTUl.description: Quest'armatura di cuoio è rinforzata con borchie di metallo e talvolta con piccole placche metalliche, offrendo molta della flessibilità di un'armatura di cuoio con una protezione più solida.
fer5YKRtixZJgTUl.name: +2 Resilient Studded Leather Armor

oEHGOxor2V2wjqVL.description: A war razor is an exaggerated version of the barbers' tool. It is a brittle but extremely sharp weapon that is very easy to slip into a pocket or sleeve.
oEHGOxor2V2wjqVL.name: +2 Greater Striking War Razor

fer5YKRtixZJgTUl.description: Quest'armatura di cuoio è rinforzata con borchie di metallo e talvolta con piccole placche metalliche, offrendo molta della flessibilità di un'armatura di cuoio con una protezione più solida.
fer5YKRtixZJgTUl.name: +2 Resilient Studded Leather Armor

DfCLdl3RYkGdmNgR.name: Collana delle Palle di Fuoco VI
DfCLdl3RYkGdmNgR.description:
This string of beads appears to be a hemp string with lustrous red beads of various sizes hanging from it. When activated, it briefly appears in its true form: a golden chain with golden spheres attached by fine threads.

This necklace has one [[/r 16d6[fire]]] damage, three [[/r 14d6[fire]]] damage and four [[/r 12d6[fire]]] damage beads with a Reflex save DC of 36. When all the beads are gone, the necklace becomes a non-magical hemp string.

Activate A Interact

Effect You detach a sphere from the necklace, causing it to glow with orange light. After you activate a sphere, if you or anyone else hurls it (an Interact action with the ranged trait), it detonates as a fireball where it lands. Your toss can place the center of the fireballed trait), it detonates as a fireball where it lands. Your toss can place the center of the fireball anywhere within 70 feet, though at the GM's discretion you might need to make an attack roll if the throw is unusually challenging. If no one hurls the sphere by the start of your next turn, it turns into a non-magical red bead.

Rigged Cubby.name: Agenti della Vegliarupe
Rigged Cubby.description: A hidden string connected to precariously stacked bricks causes the cubby to collapse in on itself when the string is pulled.
Rigged Cubby.hazardDisable: @Check[type:thievery|dc:20|name:Cut String|traits:action:disable-a-device] to cut the string without setting off the trap

ZbNsjTdTl9JRvGxk.name: Bullyrag Beatdown
ZbNsjTdTl9JRvGxk.description: Whenever the gang tough makes a successful melee Strike against a frightened creature, the Strike deals an extra weapon die of damage.

aZvRC9a03MwZf7rr.name: Frightening Critical
aZvRC9a03MwZf7rr.description: When the gang tough's Strike with a bludgeoning weapon is a critical hit and deals damage, the target becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 1}.

Poisoned Dart Statue.name: Agenti della Vegliarupe
Poisoned Dart Statue.description: Countless poison darts fire from holes in the statues and walls of this hall.
Poisoned Dart Statue.hazardDisable: @Check[type:thievery|dc:34|name:Disable Trap|traits:action:disable-a-device] (master) on the control panel deactivates the trap.
Poisoned Dart Statue.hazardReset: The trap deactivates and resets after 1 minute.
Poisoned Dart Statue.hazardRoutine: (1 action) The trap launches one dart against every creature in the hall as 1 action. Because it launches darts continuously, the trap can also use the Continuous Barrage free action (see below) to launch darts at each creature during that creature's turn. The trap doesn't take a multiple attack penalty.

Eyeball Tank.name: Agenti della Vegliarupe
Eyeball Tank.description: A vat of thick glass stands 10 feet high and is filled with green slime and fist-sized eyeballs.
Eyeball Tank.hazardDisable: @Check[type:thievery|dc:38|name:Acidify Slime|traits:action:disable-a-device] (master) or @Check[type:crafting|dc:34|name:Acidify Slime] (expert) to acidify the slime inside the tank, destroying the eyeballs
Eyeball Tank.hazardRoutine: (3 actions) Each round, the vat uses all three of its actions to shoot random eye rays at any living creatures (except Ixusoth) in range.

Living Paints.name: Agenti della Vegliarupe
Living Paints.hazardDisable: @Check[type:crafting|dc:41|name:Crafting Disable] (master) to mix the paints into bland, useless colors, @Check[type:thievery|dc:41|name:Thievery Disable] (legendary) to dismantle the animated brushes, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.9HpwDN4MYQJnW0LG]{Dispel Magic} (8th level; counteract DC 41) to counteract the magic within the paint.
Living Paints.description: A mass of brushes use magical paint to convert creatures into art.

4UovGCnsjker1UNi.description:
The avarek's Strikes deal an additional 2d6 precision damage to flat-footed creatures.

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.SneakAttack]

y4FvJN07K6t62yW1.description:
The avarek curls into a ball and rolls rapidly, impaling enemies with its spines. The avarek Strides twice and makes up to two spine Strikes at any point during its movement, each against a different target within reach.

These attacks count toward the avarek's multiple attack penalty, but the penalty doesn't increase until after the avarek makes all the attacks.
y4FvJN07K6t62yW1.name: Rolling Assault

fu5LQi1ag0KXxEby.description:
The avarek withdraws beneath its spines, presenting a defensive, spiky exterior. It gains a +2 circumstance bonus to spine Strikes and AC. Any adjacent creature that attempts a melee attack against the avarek takes 1d6 piercing damage per attack, regardless of whether the attack hits.

Prickly Defense lasts until the avarek uses a move action or makes a Strike with any weapon other than its spines.
fu5LQi1ag0KXxEby.name: Prickly Defense

Clockwork Arms.name: Agenti della Vegliarupe
Clockwork Arms.description: Four claw-tipped clockwork arms suspended from the ceiling pick up and deposit creatures into a nearby hatch.
Clockwork Arms.hazardDisable: @Check[type:thievery|dc:43|name:Deactivate One Arm|traits:action:disable-a-device] (master) to jam and deactivate one of the arms or @Check[type:athletics|dc:46|name:Tear Arm Off Machine] (legendary) to tear an arm off the machine.
Clockwork Arms.hazardRoutine: (4 actions) The trap loses 1 action per arm destroyed or disabled. On its turn, the trap makes claw Strikes against creatures other than the Rumormonger or the Inkmaster. If an arm already has a creature grabbed, the trap spends 2 actions to use its Open Hatch ability.

0KI7dYfaduuCOAlE.name: Rinascita
0KI7dYfaduuCOAlE.description:
When Frefferth is destroyed, his body and items dissipate into shadowy nothingness and the knight re-forms after [[/r 1d4 #days]]{1d4 days} within the sarcophagus in area D12, fully healed.

Frefferth can be trapped only by returning the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.6MIBHKMJmD8uQVam]{Chain of the Stilled Spirit} to the sarcophagus (see areas D12 and D34), in which case Frefferth's body dissipates, leaving his items in the spot where he was last slain.

YDAmsDKjMjg1NU8x.name: Cacciatore di Teste
YDAmsDKjMjg1NU8x.description:
Any slashing weapon a dullahan wields becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.hg3IogR8ue2IWwgS]{Keen}, and any hatchet it wields becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.qlunQzfnzPQpMG6U]{Returning}.

If the dullahan kills a creature with a critical hit using a slashing weapon, the target is decapitated as though the dullahan had used Reap on the target.

These effects remain only while the dullahan holds the weapon.

SEDzDCcVcLItgSUy.name: Decapitare
SEDzDCcVcLItgSUy.description:
Frefferth removes the head of a dead creature within reach.

Each creature within the area of Frefferth's frightful presence must attempt a new save, even if they are temporarily immune.

yzD6DHeUdHo1tXNp.name: Evocare Cavalcatura
yzD6DHeUdHo1tXNp.description:
Frefferth summons a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.pathfinder-bestiary.waPgKbjhijeZ00Zm]{Nightmare}.

This steed remains until it is slain, Frefferth @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.AjLSHZSWQ90exdLo]{Dismisses} it, or Frefferth summons another steed.

odph4tUxJEzbuuiq.description:
Whenever Frefferth damages a creature with a critical hit using a ranged piercing weapon, the weapon remains impaled in the victim's body.

The victim becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 1} as long as they are impaled; the impaling weapon can be removed by the affected creature or an adjacent ally as a 2-action activity that has the manipulate trait.
odph4tUxJEzbuuiq.name: Impaler

ZbNsjTdTl9JRvGxk.description: Whenever the gang tough makes a successful melee Strike against a frightened creature, the Strike deals an extra weapon die of damage.
ZbNsjTdTl9JRvGxk.name: Bullyrag Beatdown

aZvRC9a03MwZf7rr.name: Frightening Critical
aZvRC9a03MwZf7rr.description: When the gang tough's Strike with a bludgeoning weapon is a critical hit and deals damage, the target becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 1}.

C8jd840fpmYd3wDB.name: Suffocating Fumes
C8jd840fpmYd3wDB.description:
@Template[type:emanation|distance:5]{5 feet} @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.v61oEQaDdcRpaZ9X]{Aura}

A creature that enters or begins its turn within the aura must attempt a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:14] save, or @Check[type:fortitude|dc:17] if the pickled punk is attached to the creature.

On a failed save, the creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 1}, and on a critical failure, it's also @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 1} for 1 minute.

5DSmWdkGY2DeiYD8.name: Attach
5DSmWdkGY2DeiYD8.description:
When a pickled punk hits a target larger than itself, it uses bizarre excretions to adhere to that creature. This is similar to Grabbing the creature, but the pickled punk is not flat-footed, and it moves with that creature rather than holding it in place.

Each turn while attached, the pickled punk automatically deals the damage from its jaws Strike to the creature to which it's attached. It also wriggles about, gaining a +2 circumstance bonus to AC as long as it's not also grabbed or restrained.

sZjoXHynGmaJPLpi.name: Combustible
sZjoXHynGmaJPLpi.description: The first time each round that a pickled punk takes fire damage, its fumes combust, dealing [[/r 5[fire]]] damage to all other creatures within the area of its Suffocating Fumes aura.

vJdzS91Cmz3WZZXD.name: Soul Siphon
vJdzS91Cmz3WZZXD.description:
@Template[type:emanation|distance:30]{30 feet} @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.v61oEQaDdcRpaZ9X]{Aura}

An astradaemon draws power from the souls of the recently slain. If a Small or larger living creature dies within its aura, the astradaemon gains 5 temporary Hit Points and a +1 status bonus to attack and damage rolls for 1 round, unless the creature was slain by an astradaemon's Devour Soul ability.

Incorporeal undead and living spirits traveling outside the body take [[/r 1d8[force]]] damage each round within the daemon's aura from the spiritual pressure as the astradaemon pulls in fragments of their soul.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-effects.SjrM6XVTLySToS12]{Effect: Soul Siphon}

KyPmodj8yfI4cI99.description:
Requirements The astradaemon hasn't used an action with the attack trait yet this turn.

Effect The astradaemon draws out and consumes the soul of a living creature it has @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Grabbed}. The creature must succeed at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:39|traits:damaging-effect] save or instantly die. If it dies, the astradaemon gains 10 temporary Hit Points.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-effects.xiOi7btey4AS6jhe]{Effect: Overtake Soul}
KyPmodj8yfI4cI99.name: Overtake Soul

YoEkR6sBza4UBMYy.description:
When an astradaemon hits with its claw, jaws, or tail, it drains the target's spiritual and vital essences.

The target takes [[/r 2d10[negative]]] damage and the astradaemon regains an equal number of Hit Points. The target must succeed at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:37|traits:damaging-effect] save or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.3uh1r86TzbQvosxv]{Doomed 1} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 1}.

If the target was already drained or doomed, it instead increases both conditions' value by 1, to a maximum of 4.
YoEkR6sBza4UBMYy.name: Essence Drain

ACezcH9GTIcXGlSB.name: Mortal Shell
ACezcH9GTIcXGlSB.description:
Requirements The astradaemon has killed a Large or smaller creature with Overtake Soul within the past 24 hours and that creature is within the daemon's reach

Effect The astradaemon takes over and wears the body of their victim. This automatically creates a disguise to allow the astradaemon to Impersonate the target creature. The body has a number of Hit Points equal to 3 times the level of the creature. Any damage targeting the astradaemon damages the body first. Once the body is reduced to 0 Hit Points, it's destroyed and forces the astradaemon out, back to the daemon's normal form. If the astradaemon takes any good damage while wearing the body, the damage is dealt to the astradaemon directly and it must succeed at a @Check[type:flat|dc:5] check or be forced out of the body. Additionally, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.ihbRf964JDXztcy3]{Disjunction} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.9HpwDN4MYQJnW0LG]{Dispel Magic} can force the astradaemon out of the body with a successful counteract check against DC 41.

While wearing the disguise, the astradaemon's attacks use the reach of the body it inhabits, and its size changes to match that of the creature whose soul it consumed. Additionally, the astradaemon is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 2} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 4} while wearing the disguise. (These penalties haven't been incorporated into this stat block.)

GJh2y3nd5dKEWe8I.name: Displacement
GJh2y3nd5dKEWe8I.description:
An astradaemon bends light, appearing shifted from its true position, though still in the same space.

Creatures targeting the astradaemon must attempt a @Check[type:flat|dc:11] check, as if the astradaemon were hidden, even though it remains observed.

Effects such as the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.y2XeMe1F18lIyo59]{Blind-Fight} feat and halfling's @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.ancestryfeatures.y1EmCv2cEb5hXBwx]{Keen Eyes} that apply on the flat check against hidden creatures also apply against a displaced astradaemon.

Agent of the Gray Queen.name: Agent of the Gray Queen
Agent of the Gray Queen.npcAllSaves: +1 status to all saves vs. magic

Field Of Opposition.name: Agenti della Vegliarupe
Field Of Opposition.description: A distortion in space spawns an aggressive, malevolent shadow duplicate of any characters who pass between Terimor's faces.
Field Of Opposition.hazardDisable: @Check[type:thievery|dc:42|name:Disable Thievery] (legendary) to permanently disable the planar distortion (DC increases by 2 for each duplicate still extant), or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.9HpwDN4MYQJnW0LG]{Dispel Magic} (10th level; counteract DC 42) to destroy the planar distortion

91SKDS1GriJwurmK.name: Whisper Briolette
91SKDS1GriJwurmK.description:
Activate 2 Envision

Requirements You are an expert in Stealth

This teardrop-shaped gemstone has triangular facets and looks suitable for fancy attire, although close inspection shows that it's hollow. When it's activated, you can instantly impart up to 1 minute of speech (roughly 150 words) telepathically to any creatures you choose within 100 feet. You can impart this instantaneous telepathic message to creatures that you perceive and creatures @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{Hidden} to you, but you can't do so to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.VRSef5y1LmL2Hkjf]{Undetected} creatures. Once used, the whisper briolette becomes unusable and subtly vanishes within the next few minutes, rather than crumbling to dust.

345q6v1fOXwCpJpM.name: Attacco di Opportunità
345q6v1fOXwCpJpM.description:
Innesco Una creatura entro la portata del mostro usa un'azione di maneggiare o un'azione di movimento, effettua un attacco a distanza o esce da un quadretto durante un'azione di movimento che sta usando.

Effetto Il mostro tenta un Colpo in mischia contro la creatura innescante. Se l'attacco è un colpo critico e l'innesco era un'azione di maneggiare, il mostro interrompe quell'azione. Questo Colpo non conta al fine di determinare la penalità da attacchi multipli del mostro e la sua penalità da attacchi multipli non si applica a questo Colpo.

mYdklqhaT2LcRlN3.name: Determinazione
mYdklqhaT2LcRlN3.description: Wynsal either ends a nonpermanent condition affecting him or counteracts a nonpermanent spell affecting him (counteract level 17th, counteract check +30). This doesn't remove Hit Point damage or prevent the spell or effect from affecting others. It can't remove an ongoing affliction or conditions from a situation outside his control (such as being grappled or flanked).

ycb3x5FbTCDnmeGO.name: +2 Greater Striking Longsword
ycb3x5FbTCDnmeGO.description: Longswords can be one-edged or two-edged swords. Their blades are heavy and they're between 3 and 4 feet in length.

nUbnbXqOAEtycKyP.description: Plate mail consists of interlocking plates that encase nearly the entire body in a carapace of steel. It is costly and heavy, and the wearer often requires help to don it correctly, but it provides some of the best defense armor can supply. A suit of this armor comes with an undercoat of padded armor (see below) and a pair of gauntlets.
nUbnbXqOAEtycKyP.name: +2 Resilient Full Plate

0UpmO63mWa667Q99.name: Tactical Aura
0UpmO63mWa667Q99.description: 60 feet. Allies of lower level than Wynsal in the aura gain the Attack of Opportunity reaction. Allies who already have the Attack of Opportunity reaction can use it when a creature within their reach uses a concentrate action, in addition to normal triggers, and they disrupt a triggering concentrate action on a critical hit.

VVMmL1VxeAzF1IBI.name: Demanding Orders
VVMmL1VxeAzF1IBI.description: Wynsal commands his allies to take action. Allies within 120 feet who hear and understand his order are quickened 1 for 1 round and can use this extra action to Stride, Strike, or Step.

YNkhegfdFfE7yfGn.name: Formation Attack
YNkhegfdFfE7yfGn.description: Wynsal deals 3d8 extra damage to any creature that's within reach of at least two of his allies.

6Nu42xqROJzl0XrC.name: Hampering Strike
6Nu42xqROJzl0XrC.description: A foe that takes damage from Wynsal's melee Strike is slowed 1 for 1 round. If it's already slowed, the value of the slowed condition increases by 1.

wCtIIrUW3W5fxJS5.name: Psychokinetic Trumpet
wCtIIrUW3W5fxJS5.description:
The teraphant lets out a loud trumpet that deals [[/r 8d8[mental]]] damage (@Check[type:will|dc:27|basic:true] save) in a @Template[type:cone|distance:30]. A creature that fails its save is also pushed 15 feet (30 feet on a critical failure).

If a pushed creatures strikes a solid barrier, it takes [[/r 3d6[bludgeoning]]] damage and stops.

The teraphant can't use Psychokinetic Trumpet again for [[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4 rounds}.

s1576Kzeq8JMVNz7.description:
Trigger A creature within 60 feet of the teraphant is targeted by a spell or ability with the emotion trait

Effect The teraphant also benefits from the spell or effect, as though it were an additional target for 1 minute or until the triggering spell or ability ends.
s1576Kzeq8JMVNz7.name: Empathetic Response

k1m2BVdO1iqRouch.name: Emotion Sense 120 feet
k1m2BVdO1iqRouch.description: A teraphant can sense the emotions of creatures within 120 feet as an imprecise sense. Emotion sense is a precise sense against creatures under an emotion effect. A creature under the effects of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.b515AZlB0sridKSq]{Calm Emotions} can't be noticed via emotion sense.

8qsC3gMbkSTTQOdY.name: Impale
8qsC3gMbkSTTQOdY.description:
Requirement The teraphant has a creature grabbed

Effect The teraphant slams the creature onto one of its horns. The target must attempt a @Check[type:reflex|dc:27|basic:true] save or suffer [[/r (3d6+9)[piercing]]] damage and @Localize[PF2E.PersistentDamage.Bleed1d6.success] ([[/r (6d6+18)[piercing]]] damage on a critical failure).

kPfYHs4PPwutz153.name: Proboscide Afferrante
kPfYHs4PPwutz153.description: A Medium or smaller creature hit by the teraphant's trunk is grabbed. If the teraphant moves, it can bring the grabbed creature along with it.

Lie-Master.description:
I glabrezu sono imponenti colossi che godono nel distorcere i desideri dei mortali per condurli alla rovina. Per queste creature, tradire e manipolare è naturale quanto respirare. I desideri esauditi da un glabrezu provocano sempre le peggiori conseguenze possibili, trasformando ogni sogno o speranza in un atto di tradimento imperdonabile e distruttivo, le cui conseguenze a lungo termine non sempre risultano però immediatamente evidenti. Per esempio, un armaiolo in difficoltà potrebbe chiedere di diventare più famoso e abile nella sua arte per poi scoprire che il suo principale cliente è un assassino sadico e crudele, che usa le armi da lui forgiate per compiere una strage. Oppure una vedova potrebbe vedere esaudita la sua richiesta di riportare in “vita” il suo amore perduto solo per scoprire che ora è diventato un vampiro. I glabrezu si dimostrano innegabilmente creativi nell’esaudire i desideri dei mortali.

Questi massicci demoni sono dotati di enormi chele e di un altro paio di braccia di dimensioni e aspetto umanoidi che spuntano dal torace, ma la loro mole induce spesso a sottovaIutarne le capacità magiche: queste creature possiedono in realtà incantesimi innati di grande potenza. I demoni del tradimento sorgono dalle anime dei mortali coinvolti nelle slealtà e negli inganni.

fRDoPX53siUmNijE.name: Incantesimi Stabili
fRDoPX53siUmNijE.description: When a reaction would disrupt a glabrezu's spell, the demon can attempt a @Check[type:flat|dc:17] check, avoiding the disruption on a success.

yoqc9IMPx8HSR6k1.name: Afferrare
yoqc9IMPx8HSR6k1.description:
Requirements The monster's last action was a success with a Strike that lists Grab in its damage entry, or it has a creature grabbed using this action.

Effect The monster automatically Grabs the target until the end of the monster's next turn. The creature is grabbed by whichever body part the monster attacked with, and that body part can't be used to Strike creatures until the grab is ended. Using Grab extends the duration of the monster's Grab until the end of its next turn for all creatures grabbed by it. A grabbed creature can use the Escape action to get out of the grab, and the Grab ends for a grabbed creatures if the monster moves away from it.

pl4CFdDU1X88olbS.description:
Requirements A creature is grabbed in the glabrezu's pincer.

Effect The glabrezu pulls the grabbed creature up to 5 feet closer, then makes two claw Strikes against it. Those Strikes count as one attack when determining a treachery demon's multiple attack penalty, and the penalty doesn't increase until after both Strikes.
pl4CFdDU1X88olbS.name: Dilaniare Prigioniero

bmbqZlQmEmeXm2DS.name: Velo Subdolo
bmbqZlQmEmeXm2DS.description: Il @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.i35dpZFI7jZcRoBo]{camuffamento illusorio} di un glabrezu può permettergli di apparire come una creatura di qualsiasi taglia.

nA5lgWKn3AryAuFs.name: Desideri Distorti
nA5lgWKn3AryAuFs.description: Once per month, a glabrezu can grant a mortal humanoid the effects of a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.YfJTXyVGzLhM6V8U]{Miracle} spell granted by an Abyssal patron, though the glabrezu always perverts the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.YfJTXyVGzLhM6V8U]{Miracle} according to their own treacherous nature.

22W5tSfFGIHUXwz0.description:
You create an illusion that causes you to appear as another creature of the same body shape, and with roughly similar height (within 6 inches) and weight (within 50 pounds), as yourself. The disguise is typically good enough to hide your identity, but not to impersonate a specific individual. The spell doesn't change your voice, scent, or mannerisms. You can change the appearance of your clothing and worn items, such as making your armor look like a dress. Held items are unaffected, and any worn item you remove returns to its true appearance.

Casting illusory disguise counts as setting up a disguise for the Impersonate use of Deception; it ignores any circumstance penalties you might take for disguising yourself as a dissimilar creature, it gives you a +4 status bonus to Deception checks to prevent others from seeing through your disguise, and you add your level even if you're untrained. You can Dismiss this spell.

Heightened The spell also disguises your voice and scent, and it gains the auditory trait.

Heightened You can appear as any creature of the same size, even a specific individual. You must have seen an individual to take on their appearance. The spell also disguises your voice and scent, and it gains the auditory trait.
22W5tSfFGIHUXwz0.name: Camuffamento Illusorio

KPU0eB7pVKcWZ7de.description:
Opening a door that bypasses normal space, you instantly transport yourself and any items you're wearing and holding from your current space to a clear space within range you can see. If this would bring another creature with you-even if you're carrying it in an extradimensional container-the spell is lost.

Heightened The range increases to 1 mile. You don't need to be able to see your destination, as long as you have been there in the past and know its relative location and distance from you. You are temporarily immune for 1 hour.
KPU0eB7pVKcWZ7de.name: Porta Dimensionale

EADrJQOVO4xSRGTt.description:
You befuddle your target with strange impulses, causing it to act randomly. The effects are determined by the target's Will save. You can Dismiss the spell.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success The target babbles incoherently and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 1}.

Failure The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.yblD8fOR1J8rDwEQ]{Confused} for 1 minute. It can attempt a new save at the end of each of its turns to end the confusion.

Critical Failure The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.yblD8fOR1J8rDwEQ]{Confused} for 1 minute, with no save to end early.

Heightened You can target up to 10 creatures.
EADrJQOVO4xSRGTt.name: Confusione

rpQyk2cnz2xSksFH.description:
You call in a favor from another demon whose level is no more than doubleAbyssal pact'sspell level, two demons whose levels are each at least 2 less than double the spell level, or three demons whose levels are each at least 3 less than double the spell level.

Critical Success You conjure the demon or demons. They are eager to pursue the task, so they don't ask for a favor.

Success You conjure the demon or demons. They are not eager to pursue the task, so they require a favor in return.

Failure You don't conjure any demons.

Critical Failure The demon or demons are angry that you disturbed them. They appear before you, but they immediately attack you.
rpQyk2cnz2xSksFH.name: Patto Abissale

CWOEh5RnFG5cysRk.description:
Trigger A creature within 15 feet of the lie-master uses a manipulate or move action, makes a ranged attack, or leaves a square during a move action it's using

Effect The creature must succeed at a @Check[type:reflex|dc:34] save or be knocked prone by the lie-master's clockwork tentacles.
CWOEh5RnFG5cysRk.name: Tentacle Trip

zwQX7wlm7zgXaNXS.name: Dissolvi Magie
zwQX7wlm7zgXaNXS.description: You unravel the magic behind a spell or effect. Attempt a counteract check against the target. If you succeed against a spell effect, you counteract it. If you succeed against a magic item, the item becomes a mundane item of its type for 10 minutes. This doesn't change the item's non-magical properties. If the target is an artifact or similar item, you automatically fail.

Y386zIrZ7S3pT5rC.name: Linguaggi
Y386zIrZ7S3pT5rC.description:
The target can understand all words regardless of language and also speak the languages of other creatures. When in a mixed group of creatures, each time the target speaks, it can choose a creature and speak in a language that creature understands, even if the target doesn't know what language that is.

Heightened The duration is 8 hours.

FP5LzB5gHCWHOc7S.name: Proiettile Telecinetico
FP5LzB5gHCWHOc7S.description:
You hurl a loose, unattended object that is within range and that has 1 Bulk or less at the target. Make a spell attack attack against the target. If you hit, you deal bludgeoning, piercing, or slashing damage-as appropriate for the object you hurled-equal to 1d6 plus your spellcasting ability modifier. No specific traits or magic properties of the hurled item affect the attack or the damage.

Critical Success You deal double damage.

Success You deal full damage.

Heightened The damage increases by 1d6.

r7vHhfdRSulBJtov.name: Vulnerabilità alla Verità
r7vHhfdRSulBJtov.description: A glabrezu's lies sustain them, and the truth can destroy them. Whenever a revelation effect counteracts or reveals the glabrezu's illusions or the glabrezu fails a save against an effect that would prevent them from lying (such as zone of truth), the demon takes [[/r (3d6+4)[mental]]] damage. They take this damage only once per effect, even if the effect reveals multiple illusions or prevents multiple lies.

8JslG7YLjptMOVC0.name: Tradimento Improvviso
8JslG7YLjptMOVC0.description: Un glabrezu può sempre usare Inganno quando tira per l'Iniziativa, purché sia consapevole di almeno un avversario prima che l'Iniziativa sia tirata. Quando usa Inganno per l'Iniziativa, il demone ottiene bonus di circostanza +2 a Inganno.

Lie-Master.name: Lie-Master
Lie-Master.npcAllSaves: +1 status to all saves vs. magic

zJEYT9EyVtZRQ3Jx.description:
Adder venom is a simple but effective way to enhance a weapon.

Activate D Interact (Injury)

Saving Throw @Check[type:fortitude|dc:18]{DC 18 Fortitude}

Maximum Duration 3 rounds

Stage 1 [[/r 1d8[poison]]] damage (1 round)

Stage 2 [[/r 1d10[poison]]] damage (1 round)

Stage 3 [[/r 2d6[poison]]] damage (1 round)

Chalky.description: Questo golem è un incubo alchemico semovente, in grado di infliggere orribili ferite di ogni genere. La capacità di eseguire gli ordini gli è conferita dal cervello, per il resto privo di volontà propria, che galleggia nella sua testa a cupola. In alcuni casi estremamente rari il cervello impiegato nella creazione di questo golem può conservare alcuni ricordi frammentari o perfino una personalità vera e propria. In questi casi il golem alchemico avrà una sua volontà e perseguirà i suoi scopi.

8ubCXo0Jx35U5xxc.description:
harmed by sonic ([[/r 5d8]], [[/r 2d6]] from areas or persistent damage; healed by acid (area [[/r 2d4[healing]]]{2d4 Hit Points}); slowed by cold

A golem is immune to spells and magical abilities other than its own, but each type of golem is affected by a few types of magic in special ways. If an entry lists multiple types (such as “cold and water”), either type of spell can affect the golem.

Harmed By Any magic of this type that targets the golem causes it to take the listed amount of damage (this damage has no type) instead of the usual effect. If the golem starts its turn in an area of magic of this type or is affected by a persistent effect of the appropriate type, it takes the damage listed in the parenthetical.

Healed By Any magic of this type that targets the golem makes the golem lose the slowed condition and gain HP equal to half the damage the spell would have dealt. If the golem starts its turn in an area of this type of magic, it gains the HP listed in the parenthetical.

Slowed By Any magic of this type that targets the golem causes it to be @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1} for [[/br 2d6 #rounds]]{2d6 rounds} instead of the usual effect. If the golem starts its turn in an area of this type of magic, it's @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1} for that round.

Vulnerable To Each golem is vulnerable to one or more specific spells, with the effects described in its stat block.
8ubCXo0Jx35U5xxc.name: Golem Antimagic

10AhR44dLRwNyyyT.name: Alchemical Rupture
10AhR44dLRwNyyyT.description:
When an alchemical golem takes physical damage from a critical hit or is affected by a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.1xbFBQDRs0hT5xZ9]{Shatter} spell, one glass chamber within its body shatters, spewing alchemical liquid in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:5].

Roll on the alchemical chambers list to determine which one shatters - all creatures within a @Template[type:emanation|distance:5] are affected by the elixir in the randomly rolled alchemical chamber, and these creatures may forego their Reflex saves against the effect if they wish.

LYl3vW92ci5HFVXk.name: Alchemical Chambers
LYl3vW92ci5HFVXk.description:
An alchemical golem's body contains six alchemical chambers filled with different substances. When an alchemical golem ability calls upon a randomly determined alchemical effect, roll 1d6 and consult the following :

[[/r {1d6} #Alchemical Effect]]{1d6} Alchemical Effect
1

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.TZUskLT7yvP7N2co]{Elixir of Life (Lesser)}
2 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.T4ouD4mVFHA3EHs6]{Bomber's Eye Elixir (Lesser)}
3 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.oCuwJ9IUDAuzsUwa]{Bravo's Brew (Moderate)}
4 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.bQPRKEpnLakJBAAh]{Cat's Eye Elixir}
5 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.AqLxu3ir4UGzdOaz]{Cheetah's Elixir (Moderate)}
6 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.TMtQnY6yvIRCpK9v]{Juggernaut Mutagen (Greater)}

sbYDSGZlPbw5odWZ.name: Vulnerable to Shatter
sbYDSGZlPbw5odWZ.description: Casting a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.1xbFBQDRs0hT5xZ9]{Shatter} spell on an alchemical golem affects the golem normally, but also causes an alchemical rupture.

LPMvePNhEQEvIeA1.name: Alchemical Injection
LPMvePNhEQEvIeA1.description: When an alchemical golem hits a creature with a syringe Strike, roll 1d6 on the alchemical chambers list to determine the additional effect of the attack. The syringe deals an additional [[/r 2d6]] damage of the appropriate type.

Chalky.name: Chalky

S8lzbxGXfumHXYYq.description: The skitterstitch makes a blade Strike against an animal or humanoid. On a success, the skitterstitch slices a long strip of flesh from the target; if the skitterstitch dealt damage, it deals an additional [[/r (1d6+4)[bleed]]] damage.
S8lzbxGXfumHXYYq.name: Flay

0yo458L980s9JXH6.description:
The rotting hides and molding straw stuffing of skitterstitches are ideal nesting grounds for vermin and insect swarms.

Any animal swarm sharing a space with a skitterstitch gains @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.fJSNOw4zHGbIm4bZ]{Fast Healing} 3.

Additionally, if a creature deals at least 10 piercing or slashing damage to the skitterstitchstitch, the swarm can use its swarming bites Strike (or similar attack) against the attacker as a reaction.
0yo458L980s9JXH6.name: Pest Haven

EWsYBE6UDRYE7p46.description:
Saving Throw @Check[type:fortitude|dc:23|traits:poison]

Maximum Duration 6 rounds

Stage 1 [[/r 1d10[poison]]] damage, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Flat-Footed}, and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 1} (1 round)

Stage 2 [[/r 1d10[poison]]] damage, flat-footed, and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 2} (1 round)
EWsYBE6UDRYE7p46.name: Skitterstitch Venom

iJUSlDT7ZVFtjNSy.name: Spider Swarm Host
iJUSlDT7ZVFtjNSy.description: Skitterstitches host a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.pathfinder-bestiary.KpxhSWRIhG7ns5NA]{Spider Swarm} within themselves, which erupts out when the Skitterstitch is destroyed

HHDLYWqh0LHr49Uu.name: Stitch Skin
HHDLYWqh0LHr49Uu.description:
Requirements The skitterstitch hasn't used this ability since the last time it successfully used its Flay ability

Effect The skitterstitch sews flayed flesh to its body to seal tears and rents. The skitterstitch regains 8 Hit Points.

Blackfinger's Prayer.name: Agenti della Vegliarupe
Blackfinger's Prayer.description: The trapdoor's metal is infused with a deadly toxin that seeps out when the trap is triggered.
Blackfinger's Prayer.hazardDisable: @Check[type:thievery|dc:50|name:Gum Up Trapdoor|traits:action:disable-a-device] (legendary) to gum up the trapdoor's porous metal surface, @Check[type:crafting|dc:45|name:Render Toxin Inert] (master) to render the toxin inert, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.9HpwDN4MYQJnW0LG]{Dispel Magic} (9th level; counteract DC 45) to counteract the trap's magic

Life Magnet.name: Agenti della Vegliarupe
Life Magnet.hazardRoutine:
(1 action) The trap pulls up to four creatures that have already triggered its Magnetize the Living ability toward one of the far corners of the room, possibly pressing them into the iron bars. If all the iron bars between an affected creature and the magnetic panel remain intact, the creature takes [[/r (2d10+10)[bludgeoning]]] damage with a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:25]{DC 25 basic Fortitude} save and is restrained on a failure (Escape DC 23).

If an iron bar has been broken, the creature takes [[/r (1d10+5)[bludgeoning]]] damage instead, and if two consecutive bars have been broken the creature takes no damage (but might still be restrained on a failed save).
Life Magnet.description: A magical magnet hidden behind a panel in the corner of the room pulls not metal but living creatures toward it, heedless of any obstacles in the way.
Life Magnet.hazardDisable: @Check[type:thievery|dc:29|name:Deactivate Panel|traits:action:disable-a-device] (expert) to deactivate the panel, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.9HpwDN4MYQJnW0LG]{Dispel Magic};(4th level; counteract DC 22) to counteract the panel's magic
Life Magnet.hazardReset: The trap deactivates and resets 1 minute after there are no creatures touching the iron bars.

2RZMlb4O32zwGdui.description:
Quando investi queste strisce ricamate di stoffa, devi meditare e avvolgerle lentamente attorno alle tue mani. Queste fasciature portano incise rune d'arma che danno ai tuoi attacchi senz'armi i benefici di tali rune, facendo si che i tuoi attacchi senz'armi funzionino come armi magiche. Ad esempio, le fasciature dei colpi possenti poderose +1 danno bonus di oggetto +1 ai tiri per colpire dei tuoi attacchi senz'armi e incrementano i danni dei tuoi attacchi senz'armi da un dado dell'arma a due (di solito 2d4 anziché 1d4, ma se i tuoi pugni hanno un diverso dado di danno dell'arma o hai altri attacchi senz'armi, usa invece due di quei dadi).

Puoi migliorare, aggiungere e trasferire rune alle fasciature esattamente come faresti per un'arma, oltre a poter applicare talismani alle fasciature stesse. Tratta le fasciature come armi da mischia del gruppo da rissa con Volume leggero per questi scopi specifici. Le rune di proprietà si applicano solo quando sarebbero applicabili agli attacchi senz'armi che stai usando. Ad esempio, una proprietà che deve essere applicata ad un'arma tagliente non può funzionare quando attacchi con un pugno, ma ne ottieni gli effetti se attacchi con artigli o qualche altro tipo di attacco senz'armi tagliente.
2RZMlb4O32zwGdui.name: +3 Greater Striking speed Handwraps of Mighty Blows

BdWPHFjkOXFGTDgi.name: Attacco di Opportunità
BdWPHFjkOXFGTDgi.description:
Innesco Una creatura entro la portata del mostro usa un'azione di maneggiare o un'azione di movimento, effettua un attacco a distanza o esce da un quadretto durante un'azione di movimento che sta usando.

Effetto Il mostro tenta un Colpo in mischia contro la creatura innescante. Se l'attacco è un colpo critico e l'innesco era un'azione di maneggiare, il mostro interrompe quell'azione. Questo Colpo non conta al fine di determinare la penalità da attacchi multipli del mostro e la sua penalità da attacchi multipli non si applica a questo Colpo.

qOiRJ4goVAPViPIt.description:
Requirements Lord Guirden has a Medium or smaller creature grabbed

Effect Lord Guirden hurls the grabbed creature into a target adjacent to him. He makes a fist Strike against the adjacent target. On a success, the target and hurled creature both take 3d10+14 bludgeoning damage and are knocked prone. On a failure, only the thrown creature takes the damage and is knocked prone.
qOiRJ4goVAPViPIt.name: Hurl

CCz3eaJWNZAPwqBS.name: Master Brawler
CCz3eaJWNZAPwqBS.description: Whenever Lord Guirden makes a fist Strike and hits, he can choose to apply either the Grab, Knockdown, or Push ability to his attack.

JJluFLD9A2iKiNi4.name: Double Punch
JJluFLD9A2iKiNi4.description: Lord Guirden makes two fist Strikes, ignoring the multiple attack penalty until after both Strikes.

JABmfDIIkLC6Isuf.description: Questa piccola arma a lama viene tenuta con una mano ed è usata per trafiggere una creatura in combattimento ravvicinato. Può anche essere lanciato.
JABmfDIIkLC6Isuf.name: +2 Striking Dagger

2uY1I5T072VajQhI.description: Noto anche come usbergo, è un lungo giaco realizzato con gli stessi anelli di metallo della cotta di maglia. Tuttavia, esso è molto più leggero della cotta di maglia e protegge solo il torso, la parte superiore delle braccia la parte superiore delle gambe di chi lo indossa.
2uY1I5T072VajQhI.name: +1 Resilient Chain Shirt

7HvTKcBHlvslLf1z.description: Questo pezzo di legno o d'argento è decorato con un'immagine che rappresenta una divinità. Alcuni incantatori divini, ad esempio i chierici, possono usare un simbolo religioso della loro divinità come focus divino per usare certe capacità e lanciare alcuni incantesimi. Un simbolo religioso deve essere tenuto con una mano per essere usato.
7HvTKcBHlvslLf1z.name: Religious Symbol of Norgorber

3ihpX9W8DKeOjv6y.description:
You can see @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{Invisible} creatures and objects. They appear to you as translucent shapes, and they are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed} to you.

Heightened (5th) The spell has a duration of 8 hours.
3ihpX9W8DKeOjv6y.name: Vedere Invisibilità

bby5t2H9ih7GSUss.description:
The target makes no sound, preventing creatures from noticing it using hearing or other senses alone. The target can't use sonic attacks, nor can it use actions with the auditory trait. This prevents it from casting spells that include verbal components.

Heightened (4th) The spell effect emanates from the touched creature, silencing all sound in or passing through a 10- foot radius and preventing any auditory and sonic effects in the affected area. While within the radius, creatures are subject to the same effects as the target. Depending upon the position of the effect, a creature might notice the lack of sound reaching it (blocking off the noise coming from a party, for example).
bby5t2H9ih7GSUss.name: Silenzio

kEDYNjP5aBoo6XlE.name: Colpo Infuocato
kEDYNjP5aBoo6XlE.description:
You call a rain of divine fire that plummets down from above, dealing 8d6 fire damage. Because the flame is infused with divine energy, creatures in the area apply only half their usual fire resistance. Creatures that are immune to fire, instead of gaining the usual benefit of immunity, treat the results of their saving throws as one degree of success better.

Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 2d6.

EQvGP4B1k4AL724e.name: Allucinazione Mortale
EQvGP4B1k4AL724e.description:
You create a phantasmal image of the most fearsome creature imaginable to the target. Only the spell's target can see the killer, though you can see the vague shape of the illusion as it races forth to attack. The effect of the killer is based on the outcome of the target's Will save.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success The target takes 4d6 mental damage and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 1}.

Failure The target takes 8d6 mental damage and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 2}.

Critical Failure The target is so afraid it might die. It must attempt a Fortitude save; if the target fails, it dies. On a successful Fortitude save, the target takes 12d6 mental damage, is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.sDPxOjQ9kx2RZE8D]{Fleeing} until the end of its next turn, and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 4}. This effect has the incapacitation trait.

Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 2d6 on a failure and by 3d6 on a critical failure.

FXTugA9GorPxMpXh.description: Velberi designates one creature she can see within 30 feet as an apostate to the church of Norgorber, regardless of the creature's actual religious leanings. She can have up to four apostates designated at a time; any additional apostate removes another apostate of her choice. Velberi treats all Perception checks made to Sense Motive against an apostate as one degree of success better, and her Strikes deal an additional 2d8 mental damage to apostates.
FXTugA9GorPxMpXh.name: Designate Apostate

5HnfbOGWfzz1BGeU.description:
You channel negative energy to harm the living or heal the undead. If the target is a living creature, you deal 1d8 negative damage to it, and it gets a basic Fortitude save. If the target is a willing undead creature, you restore that amount of Hit Points. The number of actions you spend when Casting this Spell determines its targets, range, area, and other parameters.

1 Action (somatic) The spell has a range of touch.

2 Actions (verbal, somatic) The spell has a range of 30 feet. If you're healing an undead creature, increase the Hit Points restored by 8.

3 Actions (material, verbal, somatic) You disperse negative energy in a 30-foot emanation. This targets all living and undead creatures in the area.

Heightened (+1) The amount of healing or damage increases by 1d8, and the extra healing for the 2-action version increases by 8.
5HnfbOGWfzz1BGeU.name: Ferire

IAvNqKuqzpSHUsw1.description:
You channel negative energy to harm the living or heal the undead. If the target is a living creature, you deal 1d8 negative damage to it, and it gets a basic Fortitude save. If the target is a willing undead creature, you restore that amount of Hit Points. The number of actions you spend when Casting this Spell determines its targets, range, area, and other parameters.

1 Action (somatic) The spell has a range of touch.

2 Actions (verbal, somatic) The spell has a range of 30 feet. If you're healing an undead creature, increase the Hit Points restored by 8.

3 Actions (material, verbal, somatic) You disperse negative energy in a 30-foot emanation. This targets all living and undead creatures in the area.

Heightened (+1) The amount of healing or damage increases by 1d8, and the extra healing for the 2-action version increases by 8.
IAvNqKuqzpSHUsw1.name: Ferire

6eiEyE1s8fUhFfp0.description:
You channel negative energy to harm the living or heal the undead. If the target is a living creature, you deal 1d8 negative damage to it, and it gets a basic Fortitude save. If the target is a willing undead creature, you restore that amount of Hit Points. The number of actions you spend when Casting this Spell determines its targets, range, area, and other parameters.

1 Action (somatic) The spell has a range of touch.

2 Actions (verbal, somatic) The spell has a range of 30 feet. If you're healing an undead creature, increase the Hit Points restored by 8.

3 Actions (material, verbal, somatic) You disperse negative energy in a 30-foot emanation. This targets all living and undead creatures in the area.

Heightened (+1) The amount of healing or damage increases by 1d8, and the extra healing for the 2-action version increases by 8.
6eiEyE1s8fUhFfp0.name: Ferire

ogacgYPyipwYeeFG.description:
You channel negative energy to harm the living or heal the undead. If the target is a living creature, you deal 1d8 negative damage to it, and it gets a basic Fortitude save. If the target is a willing undead creature, you restore that amount of Hit Points. The number of actions you spend when Casting this Spell determines its targets, range, area, and other parameters.

1 Action (somatic) The spell has a range of touch.

2 Actions (verbal, somatic) The spell has a range of 30 feet. If you're healing an undead creature, increase the Hit Points restored by 8.

3 Actions (material, verbal, somatic) You disperse negative energy in a 30-foot emanation. This targets all living and undead creatures in the area.

Heightened (+1) The amount of healing or damage increases by 1d8, and the extra healing for the 2-action version increases by 8.
ogacgYPyipwYeeFG.name: Ferire

qEAlnIRkW8Qpao3n.description:
You create an illusion that causes you to appear as another creature of the same body shape, and with roughly similar height (within 6 inches) and weight (within 50 pounds), as yourself. The disguise is typically good enough to hide your identity, but not to impersonate a specific individual. The spell doesn't change your voice, scent, or mannerisms. You can change the appearance of your clothing and worn items, such as making your armor look like a dress. Held items are unaffected, and any worn item you remove returns to its true appearance.

Casting illusory disguise counts as setting up a disguise for the Impersonate use of Deception; it ignores any circumstance penalties you might take for disguising yourself as a dissimilar creature, it gives you a +4 status bonus to Deception checks to prevent others from seeing through your disguise, and you add your level even if you're untrained. You can Dismiss this spell.

Heightened (2nd) The spell also disguises your voice and scent, and it gains the auditory trait.
