Effect The Skinner wills the triggering creature's blood to gush from their mouth and constrict their throat. The target's spell is disrupted.

The target must succeed at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:20] save or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 2}.
cdoPISuZdSbxOwT1.name: Spell Choke

rJu8a6w24iFChezA.description:
@Template[type:emanation|distance:30]{30 feet} @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.v61oEQaDdcRpaZ9X]{Aura}

Any time a creature in the aura takes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{Persistent Bleed Damage}, the Daemonic Skinner regains the same number of Hit Points as the damage dealt.

The Skinner can have only one aura active at a time.

She can switch her active aura as an Interact action.
rJu8a6w24iFChezA.name: Transfusion Aura

1h5CBWyXY0MAHGtm.description:
Any creature taking @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{Persistent Bleed Damage} is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Flat-Footed} against the Daemonic Skinner's attacks. When attacking a flat-footed creature, the Skinner deals an additional [[/r {2d6}[precision]]]{2d6 precision damage}.

When the monster Strikes a creature that has the flat-footed} condition with an agile or finesse melee weapon, an agile or finesse unarmed attack, or a ranged weapon attack, it also deals the listed precision damage. For a ranged attack with a thrown weapon, that weapon must also be an agile or finesse weapon.
1h5CBWyXY0MAHGtm.name: Bloody Sneak Attack

IEuErW2Q6KaGlk21.name: Hook and Flay
IEuErW2Q6KaGlk21.description:
Requirements The Daemonic Skinner has a creature grabbed with her blood chain or a creature is affected by her bloody chain aura

Effect The Skinner pulls the creature into the nearest open adjacent square and makes a cleaver Strike against the creature.

kfZVz80JupwQ5DE1.description:
@Template[type:emanation|distance:20]{20 feet} @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.v61oEQaDdcRpaZ9X]{Aura}

Chains of blood bind a bleeding creature to the Daemonic Skinner.

Creatures in range that are taking @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{Persistent Bleed Damage} can't move out of the aura.

The Skinner can have only one aura active at a time.

She can switch her active aura as an Interact action.
kfZVz80JupwQ5DE1.name: Bloody Chain Aura

N85UwJsuAe8nwuWV.description: By performing an hour-long ritual, an elemental vessel can form a spell circle with an arcane or primal spellcaster. After the spell circle is formed, other spellcasters can join the spell circle by performing the same hour-long ritual while assisted by at least one spellcaster already in the spell circle. Each member of the spell circle must contribute at least one spell to the elemental vessel. The spellcaster permanently loses access to a spell slot equal to the spell's level and the elemental vessel adds the contributed spell to its list of arcane innate spells (regardless of the spell's original type). An elemental vessel can be imbued with no more than three spells per spell level. If the elemental vessel is destroyed, all members of the spell circle regain the spell slots they contributed to the creature. The arcane innate spells shown below represent a typical spell list for an elemental vessel, but each elemental vessel is likely to have different spells depending on what its spell circle has contributed.
N85UwJsuAe8nwuWV.name: Spell Circle

fgprZ9vs1zfRUz3o.description: Whenever a creature successfully counteracts one of its spells, the vessel permanently loses access to that spell and takes damage equal to 4 × the spell's level. The spell circle member who contributed that spell regains access to their contributed spell slot.
fgprZ9vs1zfRUz3o.name: Dispel Vulnerability

jJSKOhaRoCp1WwP4.description: Any member of the elemental vessel's spell circle can spend 3 actions to mentally inhabit the vessel for 1 round. While they inhabit the vessel, the inhabiter controls the vessel's actions, and the vessel uses the inhabiter's Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma modifiers for all checks. Only one creature can inhabit an elemental vessel at a time.
jJSKOhaRoCp1WwP4.name: Inhabit Vessel

g8bRqHNpfEqsTYyx.name: Internal Spell Strike
g8bRqHNpfEqsTYyx.description: The elemental vessel targets an engulfed creature with one of its spells. The spell must have a range of touch.

Water Elemental Vessel.name: Water Elemental Vessel
Water Elemental Vessel.description: Spellcasters create elemental vessels by harvesting raw elemental energy and then binding it within a specially enchanted magic circle to grant it life.

DSVJsEHiWFPACcNX.name: Attacco di Opportunità
DSVJsEHiWFPACcNX.description:
The lusca gains 2 extra reactions at the start of each of its turns that it can use only to make an Attack of Opportunity with its jaws. It can't use more than one Attack of Opportunity triggered by the same action.

Trigger A creature within the monster's reach uses a manipulate action or a move action, makes a ranged attack, or leaves a square during a move action it's using.

Effect The monster attempts a melee Strike against the triggering creature. If the attack is a critical hit and the trigger was a manipulate action, the monster disrupts that action. This Strike doesn't count toward the monster's multiple attack penalty, and its multiple attack penalty doesn't apply to this Strike.

RkUX9VYzuGsIycUb.name: Blood Scent
RkUX9VYzuGsIycUb.description: The lusca can smell blood in the water up to 1 mile away.

uW2CbK6jDKtg1sG4.name: Storm Bringer
uW2CbK6jDKtg1sG4.description: When the lusca is near the surface for more than 1 hour, clouds appear and deliver a thunderstorm with a 2-mile radius centered on its location. The weather returns to normal 1 hour after the lusca departs.

hDbNl3kiEPn8AUos.name: Capsize
hDbNl3kiEPn8AUos.description: The lusca tries to capsize an adjacent aquatic vessel of its size or smaller. It must succeed at an Athletics check with a DC of 35 (reduced by 5 for each size smaller the vessel is than the lusca) or the pilot's Sailing Lore DC, whichever is higher.

VzGeaeMNgzVgxvGo.name: Lusca Venom
VzGeaeMNgzVgxvGo.description:
Saving Throw @Check[type:fortitude|dc:38]

Maximum Duration 6 rounds

Stage 1 4d6 poison damage and clumsy 1 (1 round)

Stage 2 6d6 poison damage and clumsy 2 (1 round)

f9SGRyWKHiuofcI9.name: Ravenous Jaws
f9SGRyWKHiuofcI9.description: The lusca makes three jaws Strikes, each against a different target. These attacks count toward the lusca's multiple attack penalty, but the penalty doesn't increase until after the lusca makes all of these attacks. If the lusca subsequently uses the Grab action, it Grabs any number of creatures it hit with Ravenous Jaws.

Lusca.name: Lusca
Lusca.description: A lusca is a predatory sea monster that resembles a three-headed shark with the body of an octopus. Ferocious electrical storms usually herald a lusca's arrival; such violent bursts of electricity result from the creature's superconductive flesh, which allows the lusca to store energy from lightning strikes that it can then discharge at foes.
Lusca.npcSenses: fiutare il sangue, fiuto (impreciso) 30 metri, scurovisione

UylfhYpRBAz42DrH.name: Raffica di Colpi
UylfhYpRBAz42DrH.description:
Shristi makes two unarmed Strikes. If both hit the same creature, combine their damage for the purposes of resistances and weaknesses. He applies his multiple attack penalty to the Strikes normally.

As it has the flourish trait, Shristi can use Flurry of Blows only once per turn.

1a9J9jdVUsp4RIxQ.name: Sky and Heaven Stance
1a9J9jdVUsp4RIxQ.description:
Shristi enters a combat stance perfected by past champions of the Challenge of Sky and Heaven. While in this stance, the only Strikes Shristi can make are skyward slash unarmed attacks. These deal 1d10 slashing damage; are in the brawling group; and have the nonlethal, unarmed, and versatile P traits.

While in Sky and Heaven Stance, Shristi gains resistance 2 to electricity and sonic damage.

4nrWl1NPbkOzx2Nq.name: Victor's Medallion from the Challenge of Sky and Heaven

7PJ0xQKU3T5EtaPW.name: Heaven's Thunder
7PJ0xQKU3T5EtaPW.description:
Frequency twice per day

Effect With a loud shout, Shristi unleashes his ki as a crackling shroud of thunder and lightning that engulfs his body. Until the end of his next turn, Shristi's unarmed Strikes and Strikes with weapons that have the monk trait deal an additional 3 electricity damage and 3 sonic damage.

Pelmo.description:
I guerrieri che costituiscono la prima linea delle tribù goblin preferiscono combattere in gruppi numerosi, specialmente se sono almeno il triplo degli avversari.

Questi piccoli umanoidi hanno la pelle verde o grigia e una grossa testa dalle lunghe orecchie. Alcuni goblin sono civilizzati e hanno lavorato sodo per diventare membri rispettati nelle comunità umanoidi di appartenenza, ma per buona parte rimangono creature istintive e violente che godono solo nel seminare il caos. Questi goblin pensano solamente a uccidere il bestiame, a rapire neonati o ad appiccare il fuoco agli edifici solo per il gusto di farlo. Adorano giocare scherzi crudeli agli umanoidi più alti, che loro chiamano "gambelunghe".

I goblin sono creature superstiziose, terrorizzate dalla magia e affascinate dal fuoco; i goblin in grado di padroneggiare la magia o il fuoco godono di grande rispetto presso i loro simili. La mentalità dei goblin risulta alquanto incomprensibile per la maggior parte degli altri umanoidi: odiano i canidi, ma dividono le loro tane con i cosiddetti "cani goblin"; attaccano creature più grosse di loro senza battere ciglio, ma sono terrorizzati dai cavalli; inoltre odiano i vegetali ma considerano i sottaceti una prelibatezza. Per un goblin, ovviamente, queste sono tutte opinioni perfettamente coerenti.

rcbgrGgDNJ56oPrA.description:
Activate A Strike

Alchemist's fire is a combination of volatile liquids that ignite when exposed to air. Alchemist's fire deals 1d8 fire damage, [[/r 1[persistent,fire]]] damage, and 1 fire splash damage.

Pelmo.name: Pelmo

ZBfbG1IkIDHWmhM2.name: Correre sui Muri
ZBfbG1IkIDHWmhM2.description: The Iroran skeleton can Stride along vertical surfaces, such as walls, as long as it begins and ends its movement on a horizontal surface.

GutcPWbxQjMoihFA.name: Camminare sull'Acqua
GutcPWbxQjMoihFA.description: The Iroran skeleton can Stride across liquid surfaces. If it ends its movement on a liquid surface, it falls in as normal.

933yJ4bfZhr9zTIX.description:
Trigger The Iroran skeleton is critically hit

Effect The Iroran skeleton collapses into a pile of bones and the attack deals damage for a hit, rather than a critical hit.

The skeleton can reform in a standing position as an action, but until it does, it is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Immobilized} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Flat-Footed}.
933yJ4bfZhr9zTIX.name: Collapse

shJIHzhh4j6cG3tv.name: Flurry of Claws
shJIHzhh4j6cG3tv.description:
The Iroran skeleton makes two claw Strikes. If both hit the same creature, the damage is combined for the purpose of resistances and weaknesses.

The multiple attack penalty applies to the Strikes as normal.

sVBakTcoJU3kPGlY.name: Whirlwind Kick
sVBakTcoJU3kPGlY.description: The Iroran skeleton makes a single Strike and compares the result to the AC of all creatures within its reach, dealing damage to each creature hit.

T2IQDvzdXdy0PsfM.description:
Il bersaglio può capire il significato delle parole di tutte le lingue e parlare le lingue di altre creature. In un gruppo misto di creature, ogni volta che il bersaglio parla può scegliere una creatura e parlarci in una lingua che la creatura capisce, anche se non sa di quale lingua si tratti.

Intensificato (7°) La durata è 8 ore.
T2IQDvzdXdy0PsfM.name: Tongues (constant)

WWLbZOyOAUEoJrVO.name: Inghiottire Rapido
WWLbZOyOAUEoJrVO.description:
Trigger The minchgorm Grabs a creature in its jaws

Effect The minchgorm uses Swallow Whole.

yPuU1CPcqoZ2MfIt.description:
A swirling torrent of water manifests along a straight line, battering those that are its path and possibly pushing them away from you. The torrent deals 8d6 bludgeoning damage. Each creature in the area must attempt a basic Fortitude save. Creatures that fail the save are also knocked back 5 feet (10 feet on a critical failure).

Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 2d6.
yPuU1CPcqoZ2MfIt.name: Torrente Impetuoso

s73UR8DteBrsSG9X.name: Controllare Acqua
s73UR8DteBrsSG9X.description: By imposing your will upon the water, you can raise or lower the level of water in the chosen area by 10 feet. Water creatures in the area are subjected to the effects of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.WsUwpfmhKrKwoIe3]{Slow}.

kVdw249CmzAbj17U.description: Tentacles of water rise up and attempt to Grapple all enemies within 15 feet of the minchgorm. The minchgorm attempts an Athletics check against the Fortitude DC of each creature in the area. On a success, the creature is grabbed (Escape DC 40). On a critical success, or a success against a creature that is already grabbed, the target begins to drown.
kVdw249CmzAbj17U.name: Riptide

SczLJpfQwYYTKEvD.description: The minchgorm raises up to eight figures from nearby water, each appearing in an empty space within 60 feet of the minchgorm. A simulacrum can take any shape of size Medium or smaller that the minchgorm desires, including that of a specific individual or object, but is always plainly made of water. The minchgorm can speak, cast spells, and use its senses through its simulacra, spending actions for a simulacrum on a one-for-one basis. By using a single action with the concentrate trait, the minchgorm can cause any number of simulacra to Fly, Step, Stride, or Swim up to 60 feet. A simulacrum uses the minchgorm's AC and saving throws and has 30 Hit Points. A minchgorm can have up to eight simulacra in existence at once. Simulacra dissolve immediately when more than 60 feet from the minchgorm, or if the minchgorm dies or falls unconscious. The minchgorm can dismiss any number of its simulacra as a free action.
SczLJpfQwYYTKEvD.name: Watery Simulacra

NCSmuA0MRlQynOaO.description: Quest’arma a distanza ha una struttura simile a un arco montata su un’impugnatura chiamata teniere. Il teniere ha un meccanismo per bloccare la corda dell’arco in posizione, collegato a un sistema a grilletto che rilascia la tensione e consente di scagliare il proiettile.
NCSmuA0MRlQynOaO.name: +2 Striking Crossbow

jQNdJLLudvCqQFJq.description: Questa piccola arma a lama viene tenuta con una mano ed è usata per trafiggere una creatura in combattimento ravvicinato. Può anche essere lanciato.
jQNdJLLudvCqQFJq.name: +2 Striking Dagger

Uxhs2XTuVqdcp4Iu.description: Quest'armatura di cuoio è rinforzata con borchie di metallo e talvolta con piccole placche metalliche, offrendo molta della flessibilità di un'armatura di cuoio con una protezione più solida.
Uxhs2XTuVqdcp4Iu.name: +2 Resilient Studded Leather Armor

wuytt71AuRJcaryt.name: Passo Laterale
wuytt71AuRJcaryt.description:
Trigger The attack roll for a Strike targeting the assassin fails or critically fails

Effect The assassin deftly steps out of the way of the attack. If there's another creature adjacent to the assassin and within reach of the triggering attack, the assassin redirects the attack to that adjacent creature. The attacker then rerolls the Strike's attack roll against the new target.

PFD814sBXDi1v2I7.name: Attacco Furtivo
PFD814sBXDi1v2I7.description: The master assassin deals an additional [[/r 3d6]] precision damage to flat-footed creatures.

uIpZm7bCNAs8c7BV.name: Vorpal Garrote
uIpZm7bCNAs8c7BV.description:
Requirements The master assassin used Study Target during the previous round and must have a garrote bolt

Effect The master assassin makes a crossbow Strike against the target she previously studied. If she rolls a success on her attack roll, she gets a critical success instead. The target must attempt a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:36|traits:damaging-effect] save.

Success No additional effect.

Failure The target takes an additional [[/r {3d12}[precision]]]{3d12 precision damage}.

Critical Failure The target is decapitated and instantly dies unless it doesn't require a head to live.

SMg5BMoXiwN9nxmJ.name: Ricarica in Corsa
SMg5BMoXiwN9nxmJ.description: The master assassin Strides, Steps, or Sneaks, then Interacts to reload her crossbow.

mRPwn3ixbA1j5Wfz.name: Study Target
mRPwn3ixbA1j5Wfz.description: The master assassin observes a single target she can see, allowing her to use her Vorpal Garrote during the next round.

o1pfLDPNAQy8FT0p.description: The master assassin makes a crossbow Strike against an adjacent enemy; unlike most ranged Strikes, this Strike doesn't provoke reactions. If successful, the attack deals an additional [[/r 4d8]] precision damage.
o1pfLDPNAQy8FT0p.name: Point Blank

9gFnxK8QlnLCkXJE.name: armatura di cuoio borchiato +1
9gFnxK8QlnLCkXJE.description: Quest'armatura di cuoio è rinforzata con borchie di metallo e talvolta con piccole placche metalliche, offrendo molta della flessibilità di un'armatura di cuoio con una protezione più solida.

PigzABnoSkZuUAGP.name: Spargimento Ampliato
PigzABnoSkZuUAGP.description: Japu's bombs that have the splash trait deal 5 splash damage and splash to 10 feet.

iFX6Z8UsTWukjUxp.name: Alchimia Rapida
iFX6Z8UsTWukjUxp.description:
Cost 1 batch of infused reagents

Effect Japu creates a single alchemical item from his formula book (see Alchemical Formulas). This item has the infused trait, but it remains potent only until the end of his next turn.

loHKBZQtnioHzbFm.name: Lanciatore Rapido
loHKBZQtnioHzbFm.description: Japu Interacts to draw a bomb then Strikes with it.

yrhCj712cBYhVs5h.description:
These brass goggles are engraved with flame patterns and have thick, heavy lenses.

While worn, they give you a +1 item bonus to Crafting checks to Craft alchemical items and a +1 item bonus to attack rolls with alchemical bombs.

You can also ignore lesser cover when making Strikes with alchemical bombs.
yrhCj712cBYhVs5h.name: Occhiali dell'Alchimista

aBgGZkjF011ndSw8.name: Strumenti da Alchimista
aBgGZkjF011ndSw8.description: This mobile collection of vials and chemicals can be used for simple alchemical tasks.

TFvB8Q4vaggsZeH2.description: Japu carries the following infused items, which last 24 hours or until the next time he makes his daily preparations: infused moderate acid flasks (2), infused moderate alchemist's fires (2), moderate elixirs of life (2), infused reagents (6), infused moderate tanglefoot bags (2).
TFvB8Q4vaggsZeH2.name: Infused Items

DREnRy1SAHY6dCiU.description: moderate acid flask, moderate alchemist's fire, greater antidote, moderate bravo's brew, moderate elixir of life, moderate tanglefoot bag, wyvern poison
DREnRy1SAHY6dCiU.name: Alchemical Formulas (10th)

GRBBK98z5cdbknpi.name: Formulario
GRBBK98z5cdbknpi.description:
A formula book holds the formulas necessary to make items other than the common equipment from this chapter; alchemists typically get one for free. Each formula book can hold the formulas for up to 100 different items. Formulas can also appear on parchment sheets, tablets, and almost any other medium; there's no need for you to copy them into a specific book as long as you can keep them on hand to reference them.

Contains formulas for the following:

  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.SgtqZxt26BdjUmEB]{Acid Flask (Moderate)}
  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.gWr4q4HiyGhETA8H]{Alchemist's Fire (Moderate)}
  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.XWkeL34yJK6t5qUE]{Antidote (Greater)}
  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.oCuwJ9IUDAuzsUwa]{Bravo's Brew (Moderate)}
  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.c21stU5rhN4F2fZl]{Elixir of Life (Moderate)}
  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.evBPzM1VsuYcoenn]{Tanglefoot Bag (Moderate)}
  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.WL4O32qFifxnMj0H]{Wyvern Poison}

Ulressia The Blessed.name: Ulressia The Blessed
Ulressia The Blessed.npcAllSaves: +1 status to all saves vs. magic

I23rYMszuvKL97k7.name: Anatomia Protean
I23rYMszuvKL97k7.description:
A overdrive imentesh's vital organs shift and change shape and position constantly.

Immediately after the hegessik takes acid, electricity, or sonic damage, it gains the listed amount of resistance to that damage type. This lasts for 1 hour or until the next time the protean takes damage of one of the other types (in which case its resistance changes to match that type), whichever comes first.

The overdrive imentesh is immune to polymorph effects unless it is a willing target. If @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{Blinded} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.9PR9y0bi4JPKnHPR]{Deafened}, the overdrive imentesh automatically recovers at the end of its next turn as new sensory organs grow to replace the compromised ones.

TmEWLqRkXgHmnIV4.description:
The imentesh takes the appearance of any Large or smaller creature. This doesn't change its Speed or its attack and damage bonuses with its Strikes, but it might change the damage type its Strikes deal.

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.ChangeShape]

Gy4RoLuOaQU79ESu.description:
An imentesh's Strikes deal an additional 4d6 precision damage to flat-footed targets.

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.SneakAttack]

O97E3bY0dRr5pLCH.description: An imentesh inflicts a @RollTable[cBHMpmeIhoBdUyQT]{Warpwave} on a creature within 100 feet (@Check[type:fortitude|dc:38] to resist).
O97E3bY0dRr5pLCH.name: Inflict Warpwave

lZznKQkFobPXBxDT.name: Warpwave Strike
lZznKQkFobPXBxDT.description: Any creature struck and damaged by an imentesh's jaws Strike must succeed at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:20] save or be subject to a @RollTable[cBHMpmeIhoBdUyQT]{Warpwave}.

zn2a2GvxqbknqXbo.name: Entropy Sense (Imprecise) 60 feet
zn2a2GvxqbknqXbo.description:
An overdrive imentesh can anticipate the most likely location of a creature through their supernatural insight into the forces of chaotic probabilities and chance. This grants the overdrive imentesh the ability to sense creatures within the listed range.

The overdrive imentesh's entropy sense doesn't detect creatures under the effects of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.EoKBlgf6Smt8opaU]{Nondetection} or that are otherwise shielded from divinations and predictions.

Overdrive Imentesh.name: Overdrive Imentesh
Overdrive Imentesh.npcAllSaves: +1 status to all saves vs. magic

K287MomJCMfPXPLf.name: Fumovisione
K287MomJCMfPXPLf.description: Smoke doesn't impair an agradaemon's vision; it ignores the concealed condition from smoke.

pnx6alHWYJ3kLnBW.description:
The agradaemon regains 15 Hit Points, and a pledged fanatic of the agradaemon's choice that it can see loses 15 Hit Points (no effects apply that would decrease this Hit Point loss).

A pledged creature that dies in this way explodes and deals [[/r 9d10[fire]]] damage in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:20] (@Check[type:reflex|dc:41|basic:true] save).
pnx6alHWYJ3kLnBW.name: Proven Devotion

n9d7kqBHgMv3tOmv.description:
@Template[type:emanation|distance:100]{100 feet} @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.v61oEQaDdcRpaZ9X]{Aura}

The agradaemon is surrounded by ashy smoke. Creatures within the aura are concealed, and creatures outside of it are concealed to creatures within it. Non-daemon creatures can't breathe in the aura and must hold their breath or suffocate.
n9d7kqBHgMv3tOmv.name: Choking Smog

fC6dc9AdYYKBeuWn.description:
Frequency once per day

Effect The agradaemon designates a single willing mortal as a pledged fanatic. That creature gains resistance to fire equal to its level, immunity to the agradaemon's choking smog aura, and smoke vision.

The agradaemon can have up to 10 pledged fanatics at one time and can remove the status from any number of pledged fanatics as a free action with the concentrate trait. The status can also be removed with an @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.7Fd4lxozd11MQ55N]{Atone} ritual.
fC6dc9AdYYKBeuWn.name: Daemonic Pledge

Agradaemon.name: Agradaemon
Agradaemon.npcAllSaves: +1 status to all saves vs. magic

Kharnas's Lesser Glyph.name: Agenti della Vegliarupe
Kharnas's Lesser Glyph.description: A hidden glyph suddenly lights up and dominates the mind of any creature not bearing the sigil of Kharnas the Angel-Binder.
Kharnas's Lesser Glyph.hazardReset: The glyph can affect two creatures before it deactivates for 5 minutes and automatically resets.
Kharnas's Lesser Glyph.hazardDisable: Disable @Check[type:thievery|dc:46|name:Destroy Glyph|traits:action:disable-a-device] (legendary) to destroy the glyph, @Check[type:arcana|dc:42|name:Divert Glyph's Power] (master) to harmlessly divert the glyph's power, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.9HpwDN4MYQJnW0LG]{Dispel Magic} (7th level; counteract DC 38) to counteract the glyph

8mxc9kYnnRowCRTO.description: Le spade d'arme possono essere a singolo o doppio filo. Hanno lame pesanti e oscillano in lunghezza tra i 90 e i 120 cm.
8mxc9kYnnRowCRTO.name: +2 Greater Striking Longsword

OIyJUyKDxlE4ehrC.description: Noto anche come usbergo, è un lungo giaco realizzato con gli stessi anelli di metallo della cotta di maglia. Tuttavia, esso è molto più leggero della cotta di maglia e protegge solo il torso, la parte superiore delle braccia la parte superiore delle gambe di chi lo indossa.
OIyJUyKDxlE4ehrC.name: +1 Resilient Chain Shirt

AhIWKC4vtlgBb9Ah.name: Kit da Camuffamento (Elite)
AhIWKC4vtlgBb9Ah.description: Questa piccola scatola di legno contiene cosmetici, barba finta, mastice teatrale e alcune semplici parrucche. Di solito hai bisogno di un kit da camuffamento per inscenare un travestimento per Impersonare qualcuno usando l'abilità Inganno. Un kit da camuffamento d'élite aggiunge bonus di oggetto +1 alle prove pertinenti. Se hai creato molti travestimenti, puoi reintegrare le tue scorte di cosmetici con dei cosmetici sostitutivi adatti al tuo tipo di kit da camuffamento.

rMKwSTFsZNjo251o.name: Parata del Duellante
rMKwSTFsZNjo251o.description: As long as he has one free hand, Grimwold can parry attacks against him with his longsword. He gains a +2 circumstance bonus to AC until the start of his next turn as long as his other hand remains free.

I5UOcgBhEV16sOvv.description: Grimwold studies his foe for weaknesses to exploit. His next successful Strike against that target deals an additional [[/r 4d6]] precision damage.
I5UOcgBhEV16sOvv.name: Studied Strike

Needling Stairs.name: Agenti della Vegliarupe
Needling Stairs.description: This staircase has springs in each step, which send poisoned needles shooting up through tiny holes in the wood when stepped on. Each step, 6 in total, takes up one 5-foot square.
Needling Stairs.hazardRoutine: (1 action) The trap makes a separate poisoned needle Strike against each creature currently on an active step as 1 action. Because it is constantly jabbing needles up through any weight-bearing steps, the trap can also use its Bloody Feet free action to jab at a creature on one of the steps during that creature's turn.
Needling Stairs.hazardDisable: @Check[type:thievery|dc:33|name:Disable Stair Spring|traits:action:disable-a-device] (master) on each stair to disable its spring, or deactivate the switch in area C8 to deactivate the whole trap. Cutting the wire on the topmost stair (>@Check[type:thievery|dc:35|name:Cut Wire on Top-Most Stair|traits:action:disable-a-device] to Disable the Device) that connects the staircase to the control switch prevents the control switch from turning the trap on or off.
Needling Stairs.hazardReset: If deactivated via the switch, the trap can be reactivated with the switch in area C8.

Iron Maiden Trap.name: Agenti della Vegliarupe
Iron Maiden Trap.description: A pressure plate hidden on the floor before an iron maiden causes the torture device to snap shut and trap the triggering creature inside.
Iron Maiden Trap.hazardReset: The pressure plate must be reset manually.
Iron Maiden Trap.hazardDisable: @Check[type:thievery|dc:28|name:Disable Pressure Plate|traits:action:disable-a-device] to disable the pressure plate

A6srN9riF7cII1ek.description: Questa grossa ascia da battaglia è troppo pesante per essere impugnata con una sola mano. La maggior parte delle grandi asce presentano due lame, spesso “barbute”, cioè uncinate al termine di ogni lama per incrementare la potenza di taglio.

bLsJ5WlwMamd2QGg.name: Rinascita
bLsJ5WlwMamd2QGg.description:
When a graveknight is destroyed, its armor rebuilds its body over the course of [[/br 1d10 #days]] days-or more quickly if the armor is worn by a living host. If the body is destroyed before then, the process restarts.

A graveknight can only be permanently destroyed by obliterating its armor (such as with @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.r7ihOgKv19eJQnik]{Disintegrate}), transporting it to the Positive Energy Plane, or throwing it into the heart of a volcano.

OqEu80bVGGZXPfVs.name: Scarica Devastante
OqEu80bVGGZXPfVs.description:
The graveknight unleashes a @Template[type:cone|distance:30] of energy.

Creatures in the area take [[/r 10d12[fire]]] damage (@Check[type:reflex|dc:37|basic:true] save).

The graveknight can't use this ability again for [[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4 rounds}.

0rqwxWSqNK0Ikmdw.name: Maledizione del Cavaliere Tombale
0rqwxWSqNK0Ikmdw.description:
This curse affects anyone who wears a graveknight's armor for at least 1 hour

Saving Throw @Check[type:will|dc:43|traits:curse] save

Onset 1 hour

Stage 1 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.3uh1r86TzbQvosxv]{Doomed 1} and can't remove the armor (1 day)

Stage 2 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.3uh1r86TzbQvosxv]{Doomed 2}, hampered 10, and can't remove the armor (1 day)

Stage 3 dies and transforms into the armor's graveknight

bqTN2IAncaogzgo9.name: Maestro d'Armi
bqTN2IAncaogzgo9.description: Il cavaliere tombale ha accesso agli effetti di specializzazione del critico con tutte le armi che impugna.

1GcnjXs1m3fitCxq.description:
@Template[type:emanation|distance:30]{30 feet} @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.v61oEQaDdcRpaZ9X]{Aura}

When a creature in the aura uses a positive spell or ability, the graveknight automatically attempts to counteract it, with a +27 counteract modifier.
1GcnjXs1m3fitCxq.name: Aura Sacrilega

N5zf8LJKXg8KdskQ.name: Kharnas's Blessing
N5zf8LJKXg8KdskQ.description:
The graveknight carves the sigil of Kharnas onto an adjacent @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Immobilized} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{Unconscious} creature.

As long as the creature bears the sigil of Kharnas, it takes a -2 status penalty to saving throws against the abilities of any creature that previously served Kharnas, but it can also freely pass through any hazards that can be bypassed by those bearing the sigil of Kharnas, such as Kharnas's glyphs.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-effects.St2QzqQvKN0IaXxG]{Effect: Kharna's Blessing}

LHiVjvx4vjJjet1C.description:
Attivazione A Interagire

Dopo che hai bevuto questo elisir, la tua vista diventa più acuta nel buio. Ottieni scurovisione per le durate elencate.

La durata è 1 ora.

a6favCLO6Tji38BC.description:
Questo pezzetto di giada di solito è scolpito nella forma di un duellante, o qualche volta di una creatura con molte armi. Quando attivi il ciondolo, esso attira magicamente l'attenzione dei nemici. Fino all'inizio del tuo prossimo turno, i nemici entro la portata dell'arma cui è applicato il talismano sono impreparati.

Attivazione A comando; Requisiti Sei maestro con l'arma applicata.
a6favCLO6Tji38BC.name: Jade Bauble (affixed to Main-Gauche)

QDbM7WGGXh21h9Xw.name: Schivata Agileo
QDbM7WGGXh21h9Xw.description:
Trigger A creature targets Fayati with an attack and she can see the attacker

Effect Fayati dodges out of the way, gaining a +2 circumstance bonus to AC against the triggering attack.

WCFZ8IEU5wGPGAZK.name: Colpo a Tradimento
WCFZ8IEU5wGPGAZK.description:
Trigger A creature within Fayati's reach is hit by a melee Strike from one of her allies

Effect Fayati makes a Strike against the triggering creature.

SriOV0CxqQFmpPCv.description:
Fayati deals 2d6 extra precision damage to flat-footed creatures.

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.SneakAttack]

4mfr0BXdQQ9ZuRDr.description:
Requirements Fayati's last attack was a successful melee Strike with her rapier

Effect Fayati makes a main-gauche Strike against the same creature that she just hit. This Strike deals an additional [[/r {4d6}[precision]]]{4d6 precision damage}.
4mfr0BXdQQ9ZuRDr.name: Deepen the Wound

0Jid4uAhNoUlXWoo.name: Guildmaster's Lead
0Jid4uAhNoUlXWoo.description:
Whenever Fayati critically succeeds at a Strike against a creature, until the start of her next turn, the first time that another member of the Copper Hand deals damage to that creature during their turn, they deal an additional 1d6 precision damage to it.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-effects.dVVc5MYx4G3QPHoa]{Effect: Guildmaster's Lead}

Fm6lAJIPw6ObpzHZ.description:
Requirements A creature within 60 feet of Graem or Grinlowe is in contact with the waters of Stormholt

Effect The hag casts maze (DC 37) on the creature, magically pulling the creature beneath the water (regardless of its actual depth) into an extradimensional underwater maze of shipwrecks. Between the two of them, Graem and Grinlowe can have only one creature trapped in the maze, but either hag can use the Sustain a Spell action to sustain the effect.
Fm6lAJIPw6ObpzHZ.name: Pull Under

deQl75TOphyii6YU.description: As long as at least one other member of Myrna's coven is on the demiplane of Stormholt, the coven members add chain lightning, lightning bolt, plane shift, and punishing winds to their spells, each of which can be cast at up to 8th level.
deQl75TOphyii6YU.name: Planar Coven

byUSs0eF5Ctqs4xY.description: The sea hag can make a bargain with a willing creature, who must be of sound mind. The creature gives away a special or cherished quality-such as its courage, its beauty, or its voice-in exchange for a boon or a promise from the sea hag. As long as the sea hag keeps her end of the bargain, the only way to restore the lost quality is to defeat the sea hag or make another bargain for its return.
byUSs0eF5Ctqs4xY.name: Sea Hag's Bargain

YzsKsO21XfN1KAry.description:
The hag gazes upon a creature, afflicting it with intense distress and a gnawing sense of impending doom, with a result depending on its Will save (DC 37). The target does not need to be able to see the sea hag.

Critical Success No effect.

Success @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 1}.

Failure @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 1} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1} for 1 round. If the target was dying, it remains unconscious for 1 day. At the end of the day, it must attempt a Fortitude save against the same DC; if it fails, it dies.

Critical Failure @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 2} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1} for 1 minute. If the target was dying, it remains unconscious for 1 day. At the end of the day, it must attempt a Fortitude save against the same DC; if it fails, it dies.
YzsKsO21XfN1KAry.name: Dread Gaze

0k8i82stB4T6FXRO.name: Teleport (At Will) (Self Only) (Only within Terimor's Tower)

z84wqzko1RPXKwRr.description: Quest’arma a distanza ha una struttura simile a un arco montata su un’impugnatura chiamata teniere. Il teniere ha un meccanismo per bloccare la corda dell’arco in posizione, collegato a un sistema a grilletto che rilascia la tensione e consente di scagliare il proiettile.
z84wqzko1RPXKwRr.name: +1 Striking Crossbow

zlY2IvuCU0h5iOV8.name: Pietra del Tuono (Superiore)
zlY2IvuCU0h5iOV8.description:
Quando questa pietra colpisce una creatura o una superficie dura, l’oggetto esplode con uno scoppio assordante. Una pietra del tuono infligge il danno sonoro e il danno da spargimento sonoro elencati; inoltre ogni creatura, entro 3 metri dal luogo in cui è esplosa la pietra, deve effettuare con successo un tiro salvezza su Tempra oppure sarà assordata fino alla fine del suo prossimo turno. Molte varianti concedono bonus di oggetto ai tiri per colpire.

Ottieni bonus di oggetto +2 ai tiri per colpire. La bomba infligge 3d4 danni sonori, 3 danni da spargimento sonoro e la CD è 28.

EjxAC6le3nK3Lfmx.description: Le spade d'arme possono essere a singolo o doppio filo. Hanno lame pesanti e oscillano in lunghezza tra i 90 e i 120 cm.
EjxAC6le3nK3Lfmx.name: +1 Striking Longsword

59NYvJMmj1tMm5lr.description: Noto anche come usbergo, è un lungo giaco realizzato con gli stessi anelli di metallo della cotta di maglia. Tuttavia, esso è molto più leggero della cotta di maglia e protegge solo il torso, la parte superiore delle braccia la parte superiore delle gambe di chi lo indossa.
59NYvJMmj1tMm5lr.name: +1 Chain Shirt

wPp48cMhLkEqI4UE.name: Binding Blast
wPp48cMhLkEqI4UE.description: A commando's thunderstone is infused with special reagents to produce a blinding flash of light. In addition to the thunderstone's normal effects, creatures that fail the saving throw against the thunderstone are also dazzled for 1 round. Creatures that critically fail are blinded for 1 round. Creatures who protect their eyes, such as by wearing tinted goggles, are immune to the infused thunderstone's blinding effect.

Eq6IkJnS6klg5Kqj.name: Target Culprit
Eq6IkJnS6klg5Kqj.description: The commando designates a single creature as their culprit. The commando gains a +2 circumstance bonus to Perception checks to Seek their culprit and a +2 circumstance bonus to Survival checks to Track their culprit. The commando's attacks deal an additional [[/r 2d8]] precision damage to the culprit. This designation lasts for 24 hours or until the commando targets another creature with this ability.

wXT4WRYgfh7qLzdK.name: Key to the Skinsaw Sanctum Vault

1Rk88GORg0fjreo8.name: Chain Up
1Rk88GORg0fjreo8.description:
Requirements The Skinner has an adjacent creature grabbed with her spiked chain

Effect The Skinner attempts an Athletics check against the grabbed creature's Reflex save DC. On a success, the Skinner knots her chain around the grabbed creature, which becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{Restrained} (Escape DC = 10 + the result of the Skinner's Athletics check); on a critical success, the creature also falls @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prone}.

Regardless of whether the Skinner succeeds, she drops the chain.

z53waMQlGY7ahvCA.name: Hook and Flay
z53waMQlGY7ahvCA.description:
Requirements The Skinner has a creature grabbed with her spiked chain

Effect The Skinner pulls the creature into the nearest open adjacent square and makes a cleaver Strike against the creature.

vW6qQ6HvTQdopnBl.description: Any creature taking @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{Persistent Bleed Damage} is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Flat-Footed} against the Skinner's attacks. When attacking a flat-footed creature, the Skinner deals an additional [[/r {2d6}[precision]]]{2d6 precision damage}.
vW6qQ6HvTQdopnBl.name: Bloody Sneak Attack

ZNWERIfXN1fj8u4P.name: Chain Expert
ZNWERIfXN1fj8u4P.description: The Skinner can effectively wield abnormally long spiked chains and can do so using only one hand.

mIVZhiAlmqc8WWY7.name: Flay
mIVZhiAlmqc8WWY7.description: Whenever the Skinner makes a successful cleaver Strike against a grabbed creature, she also deals @Localize[PF2E.PersistentDamage.Bleed1d6.success] (or @Localize[PF2E.PersistentDamage.Bleed2d6.success] on a critical hit).

FvZvIio9Hz2dvltI.description:
Trigger A creature misses two consecutive melee Strikes against Maurrisa

Effect Maurrisa takes advantage of a flailing foe's opening. She can either Step 5 feet or make a melee Strike against the triggering creature.
FvZvIio9Hz2dvltI.name: Duck and Weave

DLJfYIHzmCQGAW0s.description:
Trigger Maurrisa can make an Attack of Opportunity

Effect Maurrisa chops her opponent on the back of the head or neck, possibly concussing them.

The target must attempt a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:26] save. On a failure, the creature takes damage as if hit by Maurrisa's fist Strike, and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 1}. On a critical failure, the creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 3} instead.
DLJfYIHzmCQGAW0s.name: Rabbit Punch

yzzm5eV3r1RGpar6.name: +1 Status Bonus on Saves vs. Incapacitation Effects

7vOzE1FHZEotvswQ.name: +2 Status Bonus on Saves vs. Shove

hhg7o2qV6JntAswy.name: +2 Status Bonus on Saves vs. Trip

Maurrisa Jonne.name: Maurrisa Jonne
Maurrisa Jonne.npcAllSaves: +1 status bonus to saves vs. incapacitation effects, +2 status bonus to saves vs. Shove and Trip

YhPJNRCs20xqntX6.name: Percezione del Movimento 18 metri
YhPJNRCs20xqntX6.description: A vaultbreaker ooze can sense nearby motion through vibration and air movement.

97KS2uPGBbRl3fOQ.description:
@Check[type:reflex|dc:23|traits:damaging-effect], [[/r (2d8+9)[acid]]] damage, Escape DC 23, Rupture 14 (19 when using Metallify)

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.Engulf]

MyTJRF05gqbWnyPq.name: Metallify
MyTJRF05gqbWnyPq.description:
Trigger A creature Strikes the vaultbreaker ooze

Effect The ooze's outer plasm hardens into a protective shell of precious metals. Until the start of its next turn, it gains resistance 5 to physical damage (except adamantine), it has a -5-foot penalty to its Speed, and its pseudopod Strikes gain the versatile S or P weapon trait.

efKlG6Tj9bAd6SQ9.name: Treasure Sense (Imprecise) 30 feet
efKlG6Tj9bAd6SQ9.description: The vaultbreaker ooze's metallic plasm alerts it to the presence of metals with the precious trait (including gold and platinum) within 30 feet.

BasU6Iuc7hRxhoYG.name: Form Tool
BasU6Iuc7hRxhoYG.description: The vaultbreaker ooze instinctually shapes its pseudopod into a key, lockpick, or tool required to bypass a locking mechanism; it uses this pseudopod as thieves' tools to Pick a Lock or Disable a Device.

Vaultbreaker Ooze.name: Vaultbreaker Ooze
Vaultbreaker Ooze.npcSenses: motion sense 60 feet; treasure sense (imprecise) 30 feet

The Inkmaster.description:
Gli shemhazian sorgono dalle anime dei torturatori e di coloro che godono nel mutilare i corpi fisici delle vittime. Gli shemhazian, alti poco più di 10 metri, sono muniti di numerosi speroni, artigli e zanne con cui continuano a infliggere dolore a chiunque incroci la loro strada.

Gli shemhazian adorano infliggere dolore ai mortali, ovviamente, ma più di altri demoni godono anche nel causarne ai loro simili. Di conseguenza gli altri demoni temono e odiano gli shemhazian e solo i più potenti sono disposti a collaborare con uno shemhazian per raggiungere uno scopo comune. E perfino in quei casi, lo shemhazian terrà sempre gli occhi aperti in attesa di un’opportunità per infliggere dolore e sofferenza ai suoi alleati, oltre che ai suoi nemici.

Kfw3xJtFTIHlmDoM.name: Afferrare Migliorato
Kfw3xJtFTIHlmDoM.description:
Requirements The monster's last action was a success with a Strike that lists Improved Grab in its damage entry, or it has a creature grabbed using this action.

Effect The monster automatically Grabs the target until the end of the monster's next turn. The creature is grabbed by whichever body part the monster attacked with, and that body part can't be used to Strike creatures until the grab is ended. Using Improved Grab extends the duration of the monster's Improved Grab until the end of its next turn for all creatures grabbed by it, but this costs an action. A grabbed creature can use the Escape action to get out of the grab, and the Grab ends for a grabbed creatures if the monster moves away from it.

oKA5SDFKChqNK73N.name: Sentenza DIvina
oKA5SDFKChqNK73N.description:
You utter a potent litany from your faith, a mandate that harms those who oppose your ideals. Choose an alignment your deity has (chaotic, evil, good, or lawful). You can't cast this spell if you don't have a deity or your deity is true neutral. This spell gains the trait of the alignment you chose. You deal 7d10 damage to creatures in the area; each creature must attempt a Fortitude save. Creatures with an alignment that matches the one you chose are unaffected by the spell. Those that neither match nor oppose it treat the result of their saving throw as one degree better and don't suffer effects other than damage.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature takes half damage.

Failure The creature takes full damage and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 2} for 1 minute.

Critical Failure The creature takes double damage and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 2} for 1 minute. On your home plane, a creature that critically fails is banished with the effect of a failed banishment save. A 10th-level creature or lower must attempt a Will save. On a failure, it's @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{Paralyzed} for 1 minute; on a critical failure, it dies.

op5T9gUEtMDyPC4x.name: Volare
op5T9gUEtMDyPC4x.description:
The target can soar through the air, gaining a fly Speed equal to its Speed or 20 feet, whichever is greater.

Heightened The duration increases to 1 hour.

TklnX06SRm7v7cOO.name: Invisibilita'
TklnX06SRm7v7cOO.description:
Cloaked in illusion, the target becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{Invisible}. This makes it @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.VRSef5y1LmL2Hkjf]{Undetected} to all creatures, though the creatures can attempt to find the target, making it @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{Hidden} to them instead. If the target uses a hostile action, the spell ends after that hostile action is completed.

Heightened The spell lasts 1 minute, but it doesn't end if the target uses a hostile action.

SszRRVMNTgcCygre.name: Patto Abissale
SszRRVMNTgcCygre.description:
You call in a favor from another demon whose level is no more than doubleAbyssal pact'sspell level, two demons whose levels are each at least 2 less than double the spell level, or three demons whose levels are each at least 3 less than double the spell level.

Critical Success You conjure the demon or demons. They are eager to pursue the task, so they don't ask for a favor.

Success You conjure the demon or demons. They are not eager to pursue the task, so they require a favor in return.

Failure You don't conjure any demons.

Critical Failure The demon or demons are angry that you disturbed them. They appear before you, but they immediately attack you.

l7wT4LDdfJXJETHf.name: Clockwork Brain
l7wT4LDdfJXJETHf.description: A second brain, made of clockwork, is implanted in the Inkmaster's skull. Any time he makes a Will save, he rolls twice and takes the higher result.

EbuMoQ5idyQJDEXD.name: Paralyzing Gaze
EbuMoQ5idyQJDEXD.description:
@Template[type:emanation|distance:30]{30 feet} @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.v61oEQaDdcRpaZ9X]{Aura}

A non-evil creature that ends its turn in the aura must attempt a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:35] save. If it fails, it's slowed 1 for 1 round, and if it critically fails, it is instead paralyzed for 1 round.

Tk7abWUpvDDV6Qg0.name: Succor Vulnerability
Tk7abWUpvDDV6Qg0.description: A shemhazian's mutilation is a part of them, and they can't bear to see it reversed. The first time each round that a creature heals from damage the shemhazian dealt on their last turn, the demon takes [[/r 3d6[mental]]] damage.

4TtLSpRhmqV1Dvp1.name: Tail Whip
4TtLSpRhmqV1Dvp1.description:
Trigger A creature within reach of the shemhazian's tail leaves a square during a move action it's using.

Effect The shemhazian attempts to Trip the triggering creature. On a success, the creature also takes damage as if the shemhazian had hit with a tail Strike, and if the creature was flying, it falls 30 feet.

AsXbDxRSKFmiQ6jb.name: Enfeebling Bite
AsXbDxRSKFmiQ6jb.description: If the shemhazian's jaws Strike damages a creature, the target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 3}. The target can attempt a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:37] save to reduce this to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 1} (or be unaffected on a critical success).

aqwHyoUR6cj9y6s8.name: Focused Gaze
aqwHyoUR6cj9y6s8.description: The shemhazian focuses their gaze on a non-evil creature they can see within 30 feet. If that creature isn't already slowed by the shemhazian's paralyzing gaze, it must attempt a save against the shemhazian's paralyzing gaze. If that creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed}, it must succeed at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:35] save or be @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{Paralyzed} for 1 round. A shemhazian can't use this ability against the same creature more than once per round.

rGK7KUiJ6SDgZQgL.name: Porta Dimensionale
rGK7KUiJ6SDgZQgL.description:
Opening a door that bypasses normal space, you instantly transport yourself and any items you're wearing and holding from your current space to a clear space within range you can see. If this would bring another creature with you-even if you're carrying it in an extradimensional container-the spell is lost.

Heightened The range increases to 1 mile. You don't need to be able to see your destination, as long as you have been there in the past and know its relative location and distance from you. You are temporarily immune for 1 hour.

The Inkmaster.name: The Inkmaster
The Inkmaster.npcAllSaves: +1 status to all saves vs. magic

False Door Trap.name: Agenti della Vegliarupe
False Door Trap.description: A hidden needle delivers a magical poison to anyone trying to open the door.
False Door Trap.hazardDisable: @Check[type:thievery|dc:32|name:Jam Needle in Housing|traits:action:disable-a-device] (master) to jam the needle in its housing or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.9HpwDN4MYQJnW0LG]{Dispel Magic} (6th level, counteract DC 30) to dispel the magical poison.

IiO8ytUL6tJgUAXR.name: Vargouille Venom
IiO8ytUL6tJgUAXR.description:
Saving Throw @Check[type:fortitude|dc:18|name:Vargouile Venom]

Stage 1 Damage the victim has taken from vargouille fangs can't be healed magically.

Once all vargouille fang damage has been healed nonmagically, the poison ends.

XKe1YQHD2E6lSSDn.name: Shriek
XKe1YQHD2E6lSSDn.description:
The vargouille shrieks, its scream so terrible that all non-vargouilles within 60 feet must succeed at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:16] save or be @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{Paralyzed} for 3 rounds.

The effect ends early for a creature if the vargouille moves out of sight, moves farther than 60 feet from the creature, or attacks the creature with its fangs.

After attempting its save, a creature is immune to that particular vargouille's Shriek for 24 hours.

tMhjT7tf9r9vZX4C.description:
Exposing the victim to sunlight or any light spell of 3rd level or higher pauses the progression of the disease until the victim is no longer in light.

Saving Throw @Check[type:fortitude|dc:18]

Stage 1 carrier with no effect ([[/br 1d6 #hours]] hours)

Stage 2 victim's hair falls out ([[/br 1d6 #hours]] hours)

Stage 3 victim's ears grow into leathery wings, tentacles sprout on the chin and scalp, and the teeth become long, pointed fangs (1 day)

Stage 4 victim's mind regresses to a vicious and unintelligent shell of its former self ([[/br 1d6 #hours]] hours)

Stage 5 victim's head breaks free of the body (which dies) and becomes a new vargouille
tMhjT7tf9r9vZX4C.name: Vargouille Transformation

AQMbWGVUpkE6QLbs.name: Kiss
AQMbWGVUpkE6QLbs.description: The vargouille kisses an adjacent creature that's asleep, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{Paralyzed}, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{Unconscious}, exposing it to the vargouille transformation disease.

Boiling Tub Trap.name: Agenti della Vegliarupe
Boiling Tub Trap.description: A snapped trip wire causes an alchemical bomb to detonate and blow up part of the tin tub, spilling boiling water all over the trap's victim.
Boiling Tub Trap.hazardDisable: @Check[type:thievery|dc:32|name:Remove Trip Wire|traits:action:disable-a-device] (master) to safely remove the trip wire from the bomb

SPNVzVFEBCiD0lpi.description:
Estrai l’anima dal bersaglio prima che possa passare nell’aldilà e la imprigioni in uno zaffiro nero.

Mentre l’anima si trova nella gemma, il bersaglio non può tornare in vita in alcun modo, neanche tramite magie potenti come miracolo.

Se la gemma viene distrutta o se legare anima viene contrastato nella gemma, l’anima è libera. La gemma ha CA 16 e Durezza 10. Una gemma non può contenere più di un’anima alla volta, e qualsiasi tentativo di introdurre un’altra anima al suo interno fa sprecare l’incantesimo.
SPNVzVFEBCiD0lpi.name: Bind Soul (at will)

m07lGlvw1Lb15LwE.description:
Scarichi una potente catena di fulmini sul bersaglio, infliggendogli 8d12 danni da elettricità. Il bersaglio deve effettuare un tiro salvezza base su Riflessi. L'elettricità devia verso un'altra creatura entro 9 metri dal primo bersaglio, rimbalza verso un'altra creatura entro 9 metri da quel bersaglio e così via. Puoi interrompere la catena in un punto qualsiasi. Non puoi prendere come bersaglio la stessa creatura più di una volta, e devi avere linea di effetto verso tutti i bersagli. Tira il danno soltanto una volta ed applica il risultato ad ogni bersaglio (dimezzandolo o raddoppiandolo in modo adeguato al suo risultato del tiro salvezza). La catena termina se un qualsiasi bersaglio ottiene un successo critico al suo tiro salvezza.

Intensificato (+1) Il danno aumenta di 1d12.
m07lGlvw1Lb15LwE.name: Chain Lightning (Coven)

JdUO3WrBu0Sk5jmK.description:
Un fulmine di elettricità si sprigiona dalla tua mano, infliggendo 4d12 danni da elettricità.

Intensificato (+1) Il danno aumenta di 1d12.
JdUO3WrBu0Sk5jmK.name: Lightning Bolt (Coven)

s0mhXAW1axJFfGed.description:
Tu e i tuoi alleati attraversate le barriere tra i piani dell'esistenza. I bersagli si trasportano in un altro piano, come il Piano del Fuoco, il Piano delle Ombre o l'Abisso. Devi avere una conoscenza approfondita del piano di destinazione e devi usare un diapason magico creato con materiali provenienti da quel piano come focus per l'incantesimo. Mentre i diapason per la maggior parte dei piani più conosciuti sono non comuni, proprio come l'incantesimo spostamento planare, i diapason per i piani e semipiani più oscuri sono rari.

L'incantesimo è molto impreciso, e appari a 1d20x45 km di distanza dall'ultimo posto in cui si trovava uno dei bersagli (a tua scelta) l'ultima volta che è stato in quel piano. Se per tutti i bersagli si tratta del primo viaggio in quel particolare piano, appari in un posto a caso nel nuovo piano. Spostamento planare non fornisce un mezzo di trasporto per un viaggio di ritorno, anche se un nuovo lancio di spostamento planare ti consente di tornare nel tuo piano precedente a meno che ci siano circostanze impedenti.
s0mhXAW1axJFfGed.name: Plane Shift (Coven)

VRzOD1frRuYIc8tK.description:
Venti violenti e correnti discendenti potenti pervadono l'area, formando un ciclone. Tutte le creature che volano all'interno dell'area scendono di 12 metri. Tutta l'area è terreno difficile e terreno difficile superiore per le creature che Volano e terreno difficile per le creature a terra o che Scalano. Qualsiasi creatura che finisce il proprio turno Volando all'interno dell'area scende di 6 metri. Qualsiasi creatura spinta su una superficie dai venti di questo incantesimo subisce danni contundenti come se fosse caduta.

I quadretti sull'esterno delle pareti verticali del cilindro impediscono alle creature di andarsene. Questi quadretti sono terreno difficile e terreno difficile superiore, e una creatura che tenta di passarvi attraverso deve superare una prova di Atletica o Acrobazia per effettuare una Manovra in Volo contro la tua CD di incantesimo per attraversarlo. Una creatura che fallisce termina la sua azione attuale, ma può provarci di nuovo.
VRzOD1frRuYIc8tK.name: Punishing Winds (Coven)

o8RJn5jPVvF4Ekkt.description:
Viaggi verso il Piano Etereo, il quale si sovrappone al Piano Materiale. Le creature sul Piano Materiale non ti possono vedere e puoi muoverti attraverso le cose sul Piano Materiale. Ti muovi alla metà delle tue normali Velocità, ma puoi muoverti in qualsiasi direzione (incluso verso l'alto e verso il basso). Puoi vedere nel Piano Materiale entro un raggio di 18 metri; è grigio, nebbioso e @Compendium[pf2e.conditionspf2e.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Occultato} a te. Non puoi influire sul Piano Materiale, e non puoi subire effetti dal Piano Materiale eccetto per effetti di forza e abiurazioni che hanno origine dal Piano Materiale.

Quando l'incantesimo termina, ritorni sul Piano Materiale. Se sei in aria, cadi (a meno che tu non possa volare), e se sei all'interno di un oggetto vieni spinto nello spazio aperto più vicino e subisci 1d6 danni per ogni 1,5 metri in cui sei stato spinto. Se lanci questo incantesimo quando non sei sul Piano Materiale, l'incantesimo è perduto.

Intensificato (9°) Puoi prendere come bersaglio fino a 5 creature consenzienti aggiuntive in un raggio di 9 metri. La durata massima è di 10 minuti.
o8RJn5jPVvF4Ekkt.name: Ethereal Jaunt (at will)

PN6ovO5KggUscxvM.description:
Invii un messaggio al sogno del tuo bersaglio. Il messaggio è a senso unico, fatto di un discorso fino a 1 minuto (150 parole circa). Se il bersaglio dorme, riceve il messaggio all'istante. Altrimenti, lo riceverà la prossima volta che dormirà. Non appena lo riceve, l'incantesimo termina, e sai che il messaggio è stato spedito.

Intensificato (4°) Puoi prendere come bersaglio fino a 10 creature che conosci per nome e che hai incontrato di persona. Devi mandare lo stesso messaggio a tutte loro; l'incantesimo termina individualmente per ciascuna creatura.
PN6ovO5KggUscxvM.name: Dream Message (at will)

g3Y3XnbOh4QHQnJj.description:
Lanci un dardo di forza contro una creatura che puoi vedere. Il dardo colpisce automaticamente ed infligge 1d4+1 danni di forza. Per ciascuna azione aggiuntiva che usi quando Lanci questo Incantesimo, il numero di dardi che lanci aumenta di 1, fino a un massimo di 3 dardi per 3 azioni. Scegli il bersaglio individualmente per ciascun dardo che lanci. Se lanci più di un dardo contro lo stesso bersaglio, somma i danni prima di applicare bonus o penalità ai danni, resistenze, debolezze e così via.

Intensificato (+2) Lanci un dardo aggiuntivo per ciascuna azione che spendi.
g3Y3XnbOh4QHQnJj.name: Magic Missile (at will)

mygshytVYxHhG1rn.description:
Nascosto da un'illusione, il bersaglio diventa @Compendium[pf2e.conditionspf2e.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{invisibile}. Questo lo rende @Compendium[pf2e.conditionspf2e.VRSef5y1LmL2Hkjf]{non individuato} a tutte le creature, anche se queste possono tentare di trovare il bersaglio, rendendolo invece @Compendium[pf2e.conditionspf2e.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{nascosto} da esse. Se il bersaglio usa un'azione ostile, l'incantesimo termina dopo che quell'azione ostile viene completata.

Intensificato (4°) L'incantesimo dura 1 minuto, ma non termina se il bersaglio usa un'azione ostile.
mygshytVYxHhG1rn.name: Invisibility (at will)

dgrgw8Xe71mphkCY.description:
Ciascuna creatura all'interno dell'area è assonnata e potrebbe addormentarsi. Una creatura che si addormenta a causa di questo incantesimo non cade a terra @Compendium[pf2e.conditionspf2e.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{prona} né lascia cadere ciò che tiene in mano. Questo incantesimo non impedisce alle creature di svegliarsi a seguito di una prova di Percezione effettuata con successo, limitandone l'utilità in combattimento.

Successo Critico La creatura non è influenzata.

Successo La creatura subisce penalita di status -1 alle prove di Percezione per 1 round.

Fallimento La creatura cade priva di sensi. Se è ancora priva di sensi dopo 1 minuto, si sveglia automaticamente.

Fallimento Critico La creatura cade priva di sensi. Se è ancora priva di sensi dopo 1 ora, si sveglia automaticamente.

Intensificato (4°) I bersagli cadono privi di sensi per 1 round con un fallimento e per 1 minuto con un fallimento critico. Cadono proni e lasciano cadere ciò che tengono in mano, e non possono effettuare prove di Percezione per svegliarsi. Quando la durata termina, la creatura dorme normalmente invece di svegliarsi automaticamente.
dgrgw8Xe71mphkCY.name: Sleep (at will)

MOaduge4IHL6IZ8k.description:
I tuoi occhi risplendono nel percepire aure allineate. Scegli tra caotico, malvagio, buono o legale. Individui le aure di quell'allineamento. Non ricevi altre informazioni oltre alla presenza o all'assenza. Puoi scegliere di non individuare creature o effetti dei quali sei consapevole che abbiano quell'allineamento.

Soltanto gli incantatori di 6° livello o superiore, eccetto gli incantatori divini, i non morti e gli esseri della Sfera Esterna, hanno un'aura di allineamento.

Intensificato (2°) Individui anche la locazione e la forza di ciascuna aura.
MOaduge4IHL6IZ8k.name: Detect Alignment (All Alignments; constant)

RE6Tnx8I1IisyMoz.name: Pietra del Cuore
RE6Tnx8I1IisyMoz.description:
This gemstone grants its wearer a +2 item bonus to saving throws.

Each heartstone is powered by the spirit of a specific night hag. If it's separated from her for 24 hours (or she's been dead for 24 hours), it becomes a nonmagical gemstone. A heartstone allows the hag to use additional occult innate spells: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.D2nPKbIS67m9199U]{Ethereal Jaunt} (9th level) and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.GYmXvS9NJ7QwfWGg]{Bind Soul} at will, and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.IqJ9URobmJ9L9UBG]{Shadow Blast} twice per day.

Activate A command

Requirements You must be touching the heartstone.

Effect The heartstone attempts to counteract one disease affecting you (counteract level 5, counteract modifier +18).

Craft Requirements You must be a night hag.

uOIdVHoijKlxOrxM.name: Piaga Abissale
uOIdVHoijKlxOrxM.description:
A creature can't recover from drained until Abyssal plague is cured

Saving Throw @Check[type:fortitude|dc:41]

Stage 1 drained 1 (1 day)

Stage 2 drained 3 (1 day)

ITQk9n2tp7J5FDQa.name: Cambiare Forma
ITQk9n2tp7J5FDQa.description:
The night hag can take on the appearance of any Medium female humanoid. This doesn't change her Speed or her attack and damage bonuses with her Strikes, but might change the damage type her Strikes deal (typically to bludgeoning).

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.ChangeShape]

o2CVQ3ZmITV3jaAU.name: Esplosione d'Ombra
o2CVQ3ZmITV3jaAU.description:
You shape the quasi-real substance of the Shadow Plane into a blast. Choose acid, bludgeoning, cold, electricity, fire, force, piercing, slashing, or sonic damage, and choose a 30-foot cone, a 15-foot burst within 120 feet, or a 50-foot line. The blast deals 5d8 damage of the type you chose to each creature in the area.

Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 1d8.

aSpBwekiCyfTg7kk.name: Ray of Enfeeblement (at will)
aSpBwekiCyfTg7kk.description:
A ray with the power to sap a foe's strength flashes from your hand. Attempt a ranged spell attack against the target. If you succeed, that creature attempts a Fortitude save in order to determine the spell's effect. If you critically succeed on your attack roll, use the outcome for one degree of success worse than the result of its save.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success The target becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 1}.

Failure The target becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 2}.

Critical Failure The target becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 3}.

PlFu6E3ZCVF3JCam.name: Nightmare Rider
PlFu6E3ZCVF3JCam.description: When a night hag rides a nightmare, the nightmare also gains the night hag's status bonus to saves against magic, and both the hag and rider benefit when the night hag uses her heartstone's @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.D2nPKbIS67m9199U]{Ethereal Jaunt} innate spell.

utBhBKO5t1Pl4TVo.name: Planar Coven
utBhBKO5t1Pl4TVo.description: As long as at least one other member of Myrna's coven is on the demiplane of Stormholt, the coven members add chain lightning, lightning bolt, plane shift, and punishing winds to their spells, each of which can be cast at up to 8th level.

rpruEIwmxeOzTZOp.name: Dream Haunting
rpruEIwmxeOzTZOp.description: If a night hag is ethereal and hovering over a sleeping chaotic or evil creature, she can ride the victim's back until dawn. The creature endures tormenting dreams as the hag casts @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Uqj344bezBq3ESdq]{Nightmare} on it, and is exposed to abyssal plague. Any drained caused by dream haunting is cumulative. Only an ethereal being can confront the night hag and stop her dream haunting.

qLsi1de5hGC6uHjL.name: Spell Ambush
qLsi1de5hGC6uHjL.description: A creature @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Flat-Footed} to the night hag takes a -2 circumstance penalty to checks and DCs to defend against her spells.

UPbjq29xf3jaLian.name: Mantello del Pipistrello (Superiore)
UPbjq29xf3jaLian.description:
Sewn from several long strips of luxurious brown and black silk, this cloak grants you a +3 item bonus to Stealth checks as well as to Acrobatics checks to Maneuver in Flight. You can also use your feet to hang from any surface that can support your weight, without requiring any check, though you still must attempt Athletics checks to Climb in order to move around while inverted.

Activate D command, Interact

Frequency any number of times per day

Effect You can either transform the cloak into bat-like wings that grant you a fly Speed of 30 feet for 10 minutes, or have the cloak turn you into a bat by casting a 4th-level @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.gfPjmG6Fe6D3MFjl]{Pest Form} spell on you.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-effects.ioGzmVSmMGXWWBYb]{Effect: Cloak of the Bat}

HLhPjN1be3uh5emL.name: Raffica di Colpi
HLhPjN1be3uh5emL.description: The hundun makes two Strikes with its fist. If both hit the same creature, combine their damage for the purpose of resistances and weaknesses.

zxw1AsQiZy4HbIBa.description: A hundun chaos mage can sense nearby motion through vibration and air movement.
zxw1AsQiZy4HbIBa.name: Motion Sense 100 feet

U1E1Xka1zLQxC4tT.name: Activate Attractor
U1E1Xka1zLQxC4tT.description:
The hundun releases its staff-like attractor, which hovers in place. The hundun can use an action, which has the concentrate trait, to move the attractor up to 60 feet, to a maximum of 300 feet from the hundun. It can also use an action, which has the concentrate trait, to recall the attractor, which flies to the hundun and immediately deactivates.

Creatures within 40 feet of the attractor must attempt a @Check[type:will|dc:40|name:Attractor] save if they're within the area when the attractor is activated or as soon as they enter the area while it's active. Once a creature has attempted the save, it uses the same result for the rest of that activation of the attractor.

Any restrictions on a creature's movement apply only if it voluntarily moves away from the attractor. For example, if the attractor moves closer to a creature, the creature doesn't then need to move away.

Chaotic creatures are immune to the effects of the attractor.

The attractor can't be harmed by physical attacks but is destroyed by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.r7ihOgKv19eJQnik]{Disintegrate}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.ihbRf964JDXztcy3]{Disjunction}, a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.HuGZspUvJqR09Y8u]{Rod of Cancellation}, a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.B4DnQNcGl6nFVKHl]{Sphere of Annihilation}, and other similarly powerful effects.

The attractor has an AC of 40 and a counteract DC of 37. A hundun can rebuild a destroyed attractor after [[/r 1d8 #hours]]{1d8 hours} of uninterrupted meditation. If the hundun is slain, its attractor disappears.

Critical Success The creature's movement isn't restricted.

Success The creature treats each square in the area as difficult terrain when moving away from the attractor.

Failure The creature can't move away from the attractor within the area.

DOYd8fquer3sIStG.description:
Trigger A creature attempts to target the hundun with a mental effect

Effect The triggering creature is subject to the utter chaos of the hundun's mind and must attempt a @Check[type:will|dc:40|name:damaging-effect] save.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature takes [[/r 10d6[mental]]] damage.

Failure The creature takes [[/r 10d6[mental]]] damage, is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 1}, and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 1} for 1 minute.

Critical Failure As failure, but the creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 2} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 2}.
DOYd8fquer3sIStG.name: Entropic Feedback

Hundun Chaos Mage.name: Hundun Chaos Mage
Hundun Chaos Mage.npcAllSaves: +1 status to all saves vs. magic

R1OmPKgnrpEPWGr6.name: Attacco di Opportunità
R1OmPKgnrpEPWGr6.description:
Innesco Una creatura entro la portata del mostro usa un'azione di maneggiare o un'azione di movimento, effettua un attacco a distanza o esce da un quadretto durante un'azione di movimento che sta usando.

Effetto Il mostro tenta un Colpo in mischia contro la creatura innescante. Se l'attacco è un colpo critico e l'innesco era un'azione di maneggiare, il mostro interrompe quell'azione. Questo Colpo non conta al fine di determinare la penalità da attacchi multipli del mostro e la sua penalità da attacchi multipli non si applica a questo Colpo.

yOvz4I15CCPk78ns.name: Fumovisione
yOvz4I15CCPk78ns.description: The clockwork assassin ignores the concealed condition from smoke.

Y7P7UpMZajGcxNz4.name: Attacco Furtivo
Y7P7UpMZajGcxNz4.description: The clockwork assassin's Strikes deal an additional 3d6+4 precision damage to flat-footed creatures.

GtoDWNmX34925xMc.name: Colpo Sbilanciante
GtoDWNmX34925xMc.description: Creatures hit by the clockwork assassin's rapier hand Strike are flat-footed until the start of the clockwork assassin's next turn.

OF6N85WER1HxJgCK.name: Integrated Launcher
OF6N85WER1HxJgCK.description: A projectile launcher is integrated into a clockwork assassin's systems, containing 10 spinning blades and five smoke bombs. When the assassin is destroyed, the launcher and its ammunition are also destroyed.

q4WljID3qrZ5Fpnr.name: Wind-Up
q4WljID3qrZ5Fpnr.description: For the clockwork assassin to act, it must be wound with a unique key by another creature. This takes 1 minute. Once wound, it remains operational for 24 hours, after which time it becomes unaware of its surroundings and can't act until it's wound again. The assassin can enter standby mode as a 3-action activity. Its operational time doesn't decrease in standby, but it can sense its surroundings (with a -2 penalty to Perception). It can't act, with one exception: when it perceives a creature, it can exit standby as a reaction (rolling initiative if appropriate).A creature can attempt a @Check[type:thievery|dc:33|name:Wind Down|traits:manipulate,action:disable-a-device] check to Disable a Device to wind the assassin down. For each success, the assassin loses 1 hour of operational time. This can be done even if the assassin is in standby mode.

A7VgvFTQFpm1Cc79.description: The clockwork assassin launches a smoke bomb. A screen of thick, opaque smoke fills a @Template[type:burst|distance:10] within 60 feet of the clockwork assassin. Creatures within the area are concealed, and all other creatures are concealed to them. The smoke lasts for 1 minute or until dispersed by a strong wind.
A7VgvFTQFpm1Cc79.name: Smoke Bomb Launcher

mmdbAeOOVVjLALCx.name: Rapid Repair
mmdbAeOOVVjLALCx.description: The clockwork assassin spends 1 hour of its operational time to repair itself, regaining 25 Hit Points and refilling its integrated projectile launcher with 4 spinning blades (to a maximum of 10) and 2 smoke bombs (to a maximum of 5).

mfewT8MWlHlBhBXV.description: La spada corta presenta in una grande varietà di forme e stili della lama, il cui tratto caratterizzante è però la lunghezza che si attesta sui 60 cm.
mfewT8MWlHlBhBXV.name: +1 Striking Shortsword

r2CSyvxtD75InoFP.name: Attacco Furtivo
r2CSyvxtD75InoFP.description: The child of venom deals an additional [[/r 3d6]] precision damage to flat-footed creatures.

at6MabtHqhZPINQ3.name: Suction
at6MabtHqhZPINQ3.description: The child of venom can climb on ceilings and other inverted surfaces, though such surfaces are difficult terrain for them.

EaBeGYjdT1VVqvT6.description: When a child of venom is hit by an attack that would deal slashing or piercing damage and the child of venom has at least 20 HP, the creature splits into two identical children of venom with half the original's HP. One child of venom is in the same space as the original, and the other appears in an adjacent unoccupied space. If no adjacent space is unoccupied, they automatically push creatures and objects out of the way to fill a space.
EaBeGYjdT1VVqvT6.name: Split

IFtGiv3KwyArYGb5.description: Questa lama pesante è la preferita dai custodi di siti religiosi. Ha una caratteristica lama curva che sembra una via di mezzo tra una falce e una spada. Spesso presenta fori nella lama o nel pomolo in modo da poter appendere campanelle o altri ninnoli sacri all'arma come supporto per la preghiera o la meditazione.
IFtGiv3KwyArYGb5.name: +1 Striking Temple Sword

K4f9RbGiZucMUGD8.name: Attacco di Opportunità
K4f9RbGiZucMUGD8.description:
Innesco Una creatura entro la portata del mostro usa un'azione di maneggiare o un'azione di movimento, effettua un attacco a distanza o esce da un quadretto durante un'azione di movimento che sta usando.

Effetto Il mostro tenta un Colpo in mischia contro la creatura innescante. Se l'attacco è un colpo critico e l'innesco era un'azione di maneggiare, il mostro interrompe quell'azione. Questo Colpo non conta al fine di determinare la penalità da attacchi multipli del mostro e la sua penalità da attacchi multipli non si applica a questo Colpo.

MRSyx2ZsaFXN3kSn.name: Attacco Poderoso
MRSyx2ZsaFXN3kSn.description: The veteran makes a melee Strike that counts as two attacks when calculating their multiple attack penalty. If this strike hits, it deals an extra die of weapon damage.

xzlfpLa29fzw4xH5.name: Fendente Poderoso
xzlfpLa29fzw4xH5.description: The veteran makes a melee Strike and compares the attack roll result to the AC of up to two foes, each of whom must be within their melee reach and adjacent to each other. Roll damage only once and apply it to each creature hit. A Swipe counts as two attacks for the veteran's multiple attack penalty.

yJXSa8oHuL9yaPqg.name: Wary
yJXSa8oHuL9yaPqg.description: The veteran isn't flat-footed to hidden creatures and always gains a +4 circumstance bonus to their Perception DC against creatures attempting to Create a Diversion or Lie to the veteran.

OGWP80LB2FQVxCM7.description:
Attivazione A Colpire

Il fulmine in bottiglia è preparato con reagenti volatili che creano un'esplosione di elettricità quando vengono esposti all'aria. Il fulmine in bottiglia infligge 2d6 danni da elettricità e 2 danni da spargimento da elettricità. Con un colpo a segno, il bersaglio diventa impreparato fino all'inizio del tuo prossimo turno. Ottieni bonus di oggetto +1 ai tiri per colpire.

xI1VDqm580H04DPV.description:
I reagenti liquidi contenuti in questa fiala assorbono rapidamente il calore quando vengono esposti all'aria. Una fiala del gelo infligge il danno da freddo e il danno da spargimento da freddo elencati. Con un colpo a segno, il bersaglio subisce penalità di status a Velocità fino alla fine del suo prossimo turno. Molte varianti di fiala del gelo concedono bonus di oggetto ai tiri per colpire.

Ottieni bonus di oggetto +1 ai tiri per colpire. La bomba infligge 2d6 danni da freddo, 2 danni da spargimento da freddo e il bersaglio subisce penalità di -3 metri.

ehTbj91Rs7tafuSf.description:
Una borsa dell’impedimento è riempita con sostanze appiccicose. Quando colpisci una creatura con questo oggetto, la creatura subisce penalità di status a Velocità per 1 minuto. Molte varianti di borsa dell’impedimento concedono bonus di oggetto ai tiri per colpire.

In caso di colpo critico, una creatura a contatto con una superficie solida si attacca a quella superficie ed è immobilizzata per 1 round; una creatura che vola tramite ali, ha le ali aggrovigliate, questo la fa scendere a terra senza correre rischi e diventando incapace di Volare per 1 round. Le borse dell’impedimento sono inefficaci se usate contro una creatura che si trova in acqua.

Il bersaglio può far terminare qualsiasi effetto Sfuggendo o spendendo un totale di 3 azioni Interagire per rimuovere con molta attenzione le sostanze collose. Queste azioni Interagire non devono essere consecutive e anche altre creature possono eseguirle.

Ottieni bonus di oggetto +1 ai tiri per colpire. Il bersaglio subisce penalità di 4,5 metri e la CD per Sfuggire è 19.

aZvRC9a03MwZf7rr.name: Frightening Critical
aZvRC9a03MwZf7rr.description: When the gang tough's Strike with a bludgeoning weapon is a critical hit and deals damage, the target becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 1}.

ZbNsjTdTl9JRvGxk.name: Bullyrag Beatdown
ZbNsjTdTl9JRvGxk.description: Whenever the gang tough makes a successful melee Strike against a frightened creature, the Strike deals an extra weapon die of damage.

Dart Barrage.name: Agenti della Vegliarupe
Dart Barrage.description: Four dart-loaded pipes hidden in the diagonal walls are connected to a pressure plate under the brass seal in the room's center.
Dart Barrage.hazardReset: The trap runs out of darts after 4 rounds of firing and must be reset manually by dismantling the walls to reload the launchers. If at any point there are no longer more than two creatures placing weight on the floor, the trap ceases firing but remains armed, ready to resume firing its remaining darts once triggered again.
Dart Barrage.hazardRoutine: (4 actions) The trap loses 1 action for each disabled launcher. On each of the trap's actions, it fires one dart at a creature in the center of the room.
Dart Barrage.hazardDisable: @Check[type:thievery|dc:22|name:Disable Pressure Plate|traits:action:disable-a-device] (trained) to disable the pressure plate, or four @Check[type:thievery|dc:18|name:Plug Dart Launcher|traits:action:disable-a-device] (trained) checks to plug the dart launchers

oCNXpWiLMOxihZJI.description:
Si tratta di un robusto pezzo di legno sagomato o riciclato per percuotere un nemico. I randelli spaziano da pezzi di arte militare finemente intagliati fino a semplici rami o comuni pezzi di legno.

EFFETTI DI SPECIALIZZAZIONE DEL CRITICO

Alcuni talenti, privilegi di classe, rune di armi e altri effetti possono fornirti benefici aggiuntivi quando effettui un attacco con certe armi e ottieni un colpo critico.

Questo prende il nome di effetto di specializzazione del critico. L’effetto esatto dipende dal gruppo di armi di appartenenza della tua arma, come elencato qui sotto. Puoi sempre decidere di non aggiungere l’effetto di specializzazione del critico della tua arma.

Randello: Scagli il bersaglio lontano da te fino a 3 metri (scegli tu la distanza). Si tratta di un movimento forzato (pag. 475).
oCNXpWiLMOxihZJI.name: +1 Striking Club
